programme.title: Expedition Bigfoot
programme.desc: Mireya ja Ronny palaavat paikkaan, missa he kuulivat vihellysta ja nakivat hehkuvat silmat. Mireya suostuu olemaan houkuttimena saadakseen isojalan esiin.

programme.title: Shark Attack Files
programme.desc: Paul de Gelder ja James Glancy hyppaavat lentokoneesta kilometrin korkeudesta kokeillakseen millaista on syoksya maailman kaukaisimmille haita kuhiseville vesille.

programme.title: Kotielainten pelastaja
programme.desc: The Barn Sanctuaryn porsaat ovat valmiita muuttamaan uuteen tilavaan palatsiinsa. Henkilokunta jarjestaa Andy-lehman kuoleman jalkeen muistotilaisuuden.

programme.title: Meet The Orangutans
programme.desc: Seuraa orpojen orankivauvojen elamaa Borneossa, kun ne tuodaan kasvamaan maailman vanhimpaan orankien turvapaikkaan ennen kuin ne palautetaan takaisin luontoon.

programme.title: Meet The Orangutans
programme.desc: Seuraa orpojen orankivauvojen elamaa Borneossa, kun ne tuodaan kasvamaan maailman vanhimpaan orankien turvapaikkaan ennen kuin ne palautetaan takaisin luontoon.

programme.title: Shark Attack Files
programme.desc: Hait ja delfiinit ovat aina elaneet samoissa vesissa, mutta tutkijat ovat vasta viime aikoina alkaneet ymmartaa naiden merten valtiaiden valisia suhteita.

programme.title: Dogs: The Untold Story
programme.desc: Irtokoiranpentujen ensimmaiset elinviikot Thaimaassa ovat vaaroja taynna. Kathmandussa koiria palvotaan ja ne puetaan kukkaseppeleisiin Tihar-festivaalin kunniaksi.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Syvalla Alaskan eramaassa asuu villina syntynyt ja kasvanut perhe. Billy ja Amy Brown seka heidan seitseman lastaan elavat omavaraistaloudessa, missa selvitaan vain yhteispelilla.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Alaskan eramaassa asuu villina syntynyt ja kasvanut perhe. Billy ja Amy Brown seka heidan seitseman lastaan elavat omavaraistaloudessa, missa toimeentulo riippuu yhteistyosta.

programme.title: Ihmeelliset elaimet
programme.desc: Tutkijat kertovat, miten sokeat lepakot valttyvat tormayksilta. Pitavatko hiiret todella juustosta? Miksi lamantiinien pierut ovat erikoisia? Miksi etanat ovat limaisia?

programme.title: Ihmeelliset elaimet
programme.desc: Tutkijat kertovat, miten ryhavalaat pystyvat hyppaamaan niin korkealle ylos vedesta. Miksi koira kallistaa paataan? Miksi elaimet parveilevat? Miten hamahakki luo nahkansa?

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Miamin hylatyt. Miamin elainpoliisit kokevat tehtavan itselleen erityisen laheiseksi, kun he loytavat kaksi jo adoptoitua koiraa kadulta avun tarpeessa.

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Surua riittaa tutkija Labradan yrittaessa pelastaa omistajiensa hylkaaman sairaan koiran. Nuori tytto pelastaa hevosen, joka on jatetty ilman ruokaa ja vetta.

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Elainjulmuuksien tutkijat uivat alligaattorivesissa pelastaakseen vammautuneen alligaattorin. Miamin tahan mennessa suurimmassa kaappauksessa maatilalta pelastetaan 400 elainta!

programme.title: Matkalla elainlaakariksi
programme.desc: Sarjassa seurataan kuuden elainlaakariopiskelijan elamaa ja opintoja heidan viimeisena opiskeluvuotenaan. Tulevien elainlaakareiden hoivissa apua saavat kaikenkarvaiset elaimet koosta riippumatta. (Life at Vet U, tosi-tv, USA, 2016)

programme.title: Hurjimmat minielaimet
programme.desc: Maailman syrjaisimmista kolkista loytyy pienenpienia elaimia, jotka herattavat suurta kunnioitusta. Nama liskot ja otokat ovat monstereita, jotka hallitsevat elinymparistoaan miltei yliluonnllisilla kyvyillaan: ne voivat esimerkiksi muuttaa muotoaan ja ampua myrkyllista verta silmistaan.

programme.title: Hurjimmat minielaimet
programme.desc: Madagaskarin sademetsassa tiimi etsii lahes nakymatonta otusta, nimittain pantterikameleonttia. Matelija nayttaa kokeiden perusteella uhmaavan fysiikan lakeja.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Kausi 4 osa 1/10. Denverin intohimoisin ja periksiantamattomin elainlaakari Jeff Young luotsaa Planned Pethood Plus -klinikkaansa suurella sydamella. Dr. Jeff tiimeineen hoitaa kaikenkarvaisia elaimia seka klinikalla etta siirtymalla tarpeen tullen paikan paalle syrjaisiin kohteisiin. (Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet, tosi-tv, Iso-Britannia, 2017)

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Jeff ja tiimi tarjoavat ilmaista apua Meksikon koyhille perheille. Yhdessa tyontayteisessa viikossa he ehtivat hoitaa satoja avun tarpeessa olevia elaimia.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Robert hoitaa vihaista Bunker-vompattia. Jattianakonda Nikilla on edessaan muuttopaiva. Terri hoitaa satoja sateenkaarilureja, jotka ovat loukkaantuneet raekuurossa.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Terri tarkastaa pahoin loukkaantuneen Daniel-vallabin, joka ei pysty kavelemaan. Robert ja Chandler hyppaavat hetkeksi aalloille ennen uuden komodonvaraanin noutamista.

programme.title: Tummien vesien mysteerit
programme.desc: UUSI SARJA! Kausi 1, osa 1. Biologi, kalastaja ja tutkimusmatkailija Jeremy Wade matkustaa ympari maailmaa tutkimaan vesistoja ja vesielamaa. Tutkimuskohteisiin lukeutuvat muun muassa havainnot myyttisista vesihirvioista seka alueet, joilta tietyt kalalajit ovat yhtakkia kadonneet. (Jeremy Wades Dark Waters, dokumenttisarja, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Lizzy ja Elise yrittavat pelastaa pahasta nestehukasta karsivan koiran. Hylatty, pelokas koira muutetaan uuteen varastorakennukseen, joka on suunniteltu eritystarpeisille koirille.

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Pariskunta ei uskalla hankkia lasta vihaisen Martini-kissansa takia. Hiekkalaatikosta taisteleville Tana - ja Buddha -kissoille taytyy opettaa sopuisaa kaytosta.

programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: Perheen kaksi nigerialaista kaapiovuohta aiheuttaa sekasortoa takapihalla! Antonio tekee pihasta hauskan vuohien leikkikentan, johon kuuluu mm. kiipeilytorni.

programme.title: Koteja lemmikkiperheille
programme.desc: Palomies Ricky on pelastanut palavasta rakennuksesta burmanpythonin. Kellarin muokkaaminen valtaisaksi kaarmemaailmaksi on yksi Antonion kaikkien aikojen suurimmista hankkeista.

programme.title: Harvinaisten elainten jaljilla
programme.desc: Madagaskarin Pachy-makit olivat punaturkkisia, lahes isojen apinoiden kokoisia jattilaisia. Forrest etsii puiden latvustosta todisteita, etta laji on edelleen hengissa.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: ATL-rappari 2 Chainz etsii itselleen Tanked-out -akvaariota. Kun Wayde hukkaa tarkeat mitat, han painostaa Redneckin juuri taman akvaarion pariin.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Maailmanmestarinyrkkeilija Fernando Vargas tilaa nyrkkeilyhanskan muotoisen akvaarion harjoitussalilleen Las Vegasiin. Tuleeko siita taystyrmays?

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Howie Mandel tilaa uuden akvaarion, talla kertaa yllatykseksi agenttinsa yritykselle. Jo olemassa oleva akvaario tarvitsee paivitysta.

programme.title: Alaska: Surviving the Last Frontier
programme.desc: Tim, Allan ja Jasmine kokevat Alaskan ilmaston raakuuden lahtiessaan retkelle, jolla ylitetaan jokia ja jaatikoita ja kamppaillaan lumimyrskyssa.

programme.title: Animal ER
programme.desc: Alaskanmalamuutti Oorla tulee sairaalaan syopakasvaimen poiston jalkeen. Elainlaakarit huomaavat syovan levinneen, mutta voiko sadehoito parantaa sen?

programme.title: Kotielainten pelastaja
programme.desc: Dan McKernan jatti kaupunkielaman taakseen, muutti Michiganin maaseudulle ja perusti maatilalleen elainsuojelualueen. Sarjassa otetaan katsaus tilan sydanta lammittaviin pelastustarinoihin ja jokapaivaiseen elamaan.

programme.title: Alaskan erakot
programme.desc: Talven lahestyessa perheet lahtevat hirvimetsalle. Heimo ja Edna tekevat yhteistyota. Tyler seuraa valttelevaa uroshirvea.

programme.title: Harvinaisten elainten jaljilla
programme.desc: Madagaskarin Pachy-makit olivat punaturkkisia, lahes isojen apinoiden kokoisia jattilaisia. Forrest etsii puiden latvustosta todisteita, etta laji on edelleen hengissa.

programme.title: Ihanat kamalat lemmikit
programme.desc: Jaksossa nahdaan ruokaa varasteleva ja taloa tuhoava kissa, jaakaapissa tuhoa aiheuttava kani ja koira, joka jahtaa jaateloautoa niin kauan, etta se saa mehujaatelon.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: The Browns begin an ambitious barn build, the key to Billys grand vision. Plus, Noah returns, reuniting the entire wolfpack for the first time since Alaska.

programme.title: Erakkoperhe eramaassa
programme.desc: Alaskan eramaassa asuu villina syntynyt ja kasvanut perhe. Billy ja Amy Brown seka heidan seitseman lastaan elavat omavaraistaloudessa, missa parjaaminen riippuu yhteistyosta.

programme.title: Fish Or Die
programme.desc: Pojat navigoivat Meksikossa krokotiilien ja hyttysten piinaamien vesivaylien ja laguunien kautta kohti tarpooni-kalojen paratiisia.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Grace-vauva tutkii maailmaa, samalla kun Robert ja tiimi yrittavat tehda Australian elaintarhan suurimman alligaattorin siirron. Terri avustaa sumatrannorsuja.

programme.title: Bronxin elaintarha
programme.desc: New Yorkin Bronxissa sijaitsevassa elaintarhassa asuu yli 6000 elainta, joiden hyvinvoinnista vastaa 500 asialleen omistautunutta tyontekijaa. Sarja vie elaintarhan kiehtoviin kulisseihin, joissa jokainen paiva on taynna yllatyksia.

programme.title: Kotielainten pelastaja
programme.desc: The Barn Sanctuaryn porsaat ovat valmiita muuttamaan uuteen tilavaan palatsiinsa. Henkilokunta jarjestaa Andy-lehman kuoleman jalkeen muistotilaisuuden.

programme.title: Kalliovuorten elainlaakari
programme.desc: Elainlaakari Jeff loytaa koiralta ison kasvaimen. Elainlaakariteknikko Kelly hoitaa oman koiransa auringonpolttamaa kirsua. Elainlaakarit Baier ja Hector hoitavat yhdessa biisonia.

programme.title: Akvaariomestarit
programme.desc: Liikemies Brad Jennings tilaa uuden toimistonsa loppusilaukseksi kolme akvaariota. Niissa nakyy lisahuoneita, joista yhdessa on jopa toimiva takka!

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Elainjulmuuksien tutkijat uivat alligaattorivesissa pelastaakseen vammautuneen alligaattorin. Miamin tahan mennessa suurimmassa kaappauksessa maatilalta pelastetaan 400 elainta!

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Manaatin pelastus. Manaatin rapylan dramaattinen pelastus paljastaa salaisuuden. Tutkija Casadevall etsii salametsastajia, joiden hyokkayksissa on kuollut useita karjaelaimia.

programme.title: Maatilan pelastajat
programme.desc: Raneyt paastavat luovuutensa valloilleen laavan tuhoamalla tilalla Havaijilla. Tila taytyy myos suojata tulevien tulivuorenpurkausten varalle.

programme.title: Fish Or Die
programme.desc: Pojat navigoivat Meksikossa krokotiilien ja hyttysten piinaamien vesivaylien ja laguunien kautta kohti tarpooni-kalojen paratiisia.

programme.title: Uskomattomat puumajat
programme.desc: Kaksi elakelaista Wisconsinista rakennuttaa maatilalleen aittamaisen puumajan. Pete suunnittelee kolme luksusosastoa ja terassin, josta on nakyma alpakoiden tallille.

programme.title: Ehdonalaisvangit koirankouluttajina
programme.desc: Kausi 10 osa 12/21. Tia Torres kuntouttaa kaltoinkohdeltuja amerikanpitbullterriereita ehdonalaisvankien avulla Villalobosin pelastuskeskuksessa. Tekemista riittaa, kun tyontekijoiden pyrkimyksena on myos muuttaa ihmisten asenteita kiisteltya ja pelattya koirarotua kohtaan. (Pit Bulls And Parolees, tosi-tv, USA, 2018)

programme.title: Kissakuiskaaja
programme.desc: Kausi 8, osa 11. Kissojen kayttaytymista tutkiva Jackson Galaxy auttaa epatoivoisia kissanomistajia, joiden kodit ja ihmissuhteet ovat riekaleina naiden hurjien lemmikkien vuoksi. (My Cat from Hell, perhesarja, USA, 2016)

programme.desc: Perhe elaa ahtaassa kodissa pelastamiensa elainten kanssa. Elaimiin kuuluu mm. kaksi minihevosta, jotka nukkuvat vanhempien makuuhuoneessa! Antonio rakentaa niille tallin.

programme.title: Hirvio sisallani

programme.title: Julius Caesar: The Making of a Dictator
programme.desc: Events beyond Caesars control threaten to unravel his plans and leave him isolated. Pushed into a corner, he makes a decision that will change the course of the republic forever.

programme.title: Fatal Forecast
programme.desc: A recent report published by NOAA and NASA con rmed that 2010 to 2019 was the hottest decade since record keeping began 140 years ago. In July of 2018, new temperature records were set around the world and Death Valley experienced the hottest month ever recorded on earth. 2/8

programme.title: Life Below Zero

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild
programme.desc: Ben revisits Alex, living in the mountains of central Portugal, discovering Alex has followed his dream of creating a retreat and made significant progress with the infrastructure on his land.

programme.title: Food: Delicious Science
programme.desc: James reveals the surprising link between chocolate and breast milk, a remarkable team studies the effect of caffeine on bees and Michael finds out what hot chillies do to our brains.

programme.title: Fishing Impossible

programme.title: Life Below Zero

programme.title: Inside the Factory

programme.title: Secrets Of The Sun With Dara Ó Briain
programme.desc: Exploring our vital relationship with the Sun, from sun-worship and monuments such as Stonehenge, to how the Sun was formed and where its ferocious power comes from.

programme.title: Ancient Powers
programme.desc: In a brutal world where nature is both friend and foe, our ancient powers are just beginning, they must use all their skill and ingenuity to shape their territory and establish their cultures.

programme.title: Walking With Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Based on an unprecedented discovery in Alberta, Canada, this episode tells the epic tale of one of the largest dinosaur herds that ever lived, the Pachyrhinosaurus, through the eyes of one of its youngest members, Albie.

programme.title: Life Below Zero
programme.desc: Sue collects firewood. Ricko and his son Skyler go beaver trapping. Jessie explores his newly purchased land. The Hailstones move up river.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild
programme.desc: Ben revisits his old friends Georg and Bettina, who live on a remote bogland in County Mayo. They found solace in the wilds of Ireland, but three years later, they are still weighing up options. 3/6

programme.title: Earth
programme.desc: 252 million years ago 90% of all species on Earth died. This extraordinary moment in history took life to the brink. But, somehow, life found a way to bounce back, and a new geological era began.

programme.title: Fishing Impossible
programme.desc: The team have been tasked with catching Ling from the WWI and WWII wrecks of Scapa Flow in Scotland, but as its so cold the fish will be tucked into the wrecked ships and theyll need an ingenious plan to try to catch them. 8/10

programme.title: Julius Caesar: The Making of a Dictator
programme.desc: As Caesar takes control of Rome and consolidates his grip over the republic, he awards himself ever-greater powers. Appointed dictator for one year to restore peace, he soon extends this to 10 years, then for the rest of his life. As his ambition turned to tyranny, a handful of senators, including some of his closest allies, plotted to end his rule by assassination. But will that be enough to save the republic?

programme.title: Fatal Forecast

programme.title: Life Below Zero

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace visits the UKs largest sports shoe factory to see how 3,500 pairs of trainers are made every day, before meeting the man who comes up with the latest designs. Cherry Healey gets hands-on in a tannery, helping to process thousands of rawhides into finished leather for the nations shoes, and finds out how a ballet company painstakingly create 250,000 ballet shoes per year. Ruth Goodman reveals how, when the sewing machine was first introduced into shoe factories in the mid-19th century, traditional shoemakers went on strike to rebel against joining a restrictive production line

programme.title: Asia

programme.title: The Worlds Deadliest Weather

programme.title: Secrets of the Superagers

programme.title: Joanna Lumleys Danube
programme.desc: Joanna heads towards the Danube Delta, one of the last great wilderness areas remaining in Europe, full of birdlife including the majestic Pelican. At the mouth of the river, on Romanias Black Sea coast, Joanna bids farewell to the Danube and reflects on her amazing journey.

programme.title: Life Below Zero

programme.title: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild

programme.title: Asia
programme.desc: Asias jungles are exceptionally diverse, but whilst they provide shelter, food and opportunity, they are also full of dangers and hidden threats. In monsoon forests, tigers tenaciously hunt their prey, and prehistoric-looking rhinos play courtship games akin to kiss-chase. In tropical rainforests, female orangutans must search far and wide to find their perfect mates. And in the little-known forests of Iraqi Kurdistan, a new Persian leopard population is growing amid minefields.

programme.title: Inside the Factory
programme.desc: Gregg Wallace, Cherry Healey and Ruth Goodman investigate the origins and production of more household staples, beginning with tea. programme.title: Elamaa aarirajoilla: Alaska

programme.title: Elamaa aarirajoilla: Alaska
programme.desc: Kun viimeiset lumet sulavat Alaskasta, arktisten alueiden asukkaat tekevat samalla heinaa auringonpaisteessa. Niukan talven jalkeen Andy Bassich ja Denise Becker etsivat hedelmallisia metsastysmaita.

programme.title: Koko Britannia leipoo
programme.desc: Kisan puolivali on ylitetty, ja vain seitseman innokasta leipuria on enaa jaljella. Kahvin ja teen kaveriksi on luvassa nyt mita erinaisimpia herkkuja, kun kisailijat haastetaan tekemaan omat versionsa perinteisista eurooppalaisista pullista. Sita ennen on jo ehditty pyorayttaa brittilainen teekakku seka koristeellinen ranskalainen couronne-kruunu. Brittilaisessa leivontaohjelmassa innokkaat amatoorileipojat kisailevat toisiaan vastaan erilaisissa leivontahaasteissa.

programme.title: Koko Britannia leipoo
programme.desc: Leivonnaisten ja pasteijoiden tayttamassa jaksossa nahdaan jalleen brittilaisen ja ranskalaisen perinteen nokittelua, kun kahdessa ensimmaisessa haasteessa modernisoidaan ensin suet puddingia ja pyritaan sen jalkeen taydellisyyteen haastavan religieuse-leivonnaisen parissa. Jakson kliimaksissa luovuus paasee valloilleen, kun voitaikinaa aletaan tayttaa mita erinaisin herkuin. Brittilaisessa leivontaohjelmassa innokkaat amatoorileipojat kisailevat toisiaan vastaan erilaisissa leivontahaasteissa.

programme.title: Koko Britannia leipoo
programme.desc: Omana taidonnaytteenaan leipurit valmistavat vuokaleivan ei-perinteisista jauhoista. Niiden sijaan kaytetaan harvinaisempia jauhoja, kuten spelttia tai tapiokaa.

programme.title: Murha paratiisissa
programme.desc: Ystavajoukon hevosvaellus loppuu lyhyeen silla yksi ryhmalainen katoaa, ja loytyy kuolleena poliisiasemalta. Jack tiiminsa kanssa ryhtyy selvittamaan kuinka mies oli sinne paatynyt.

programme.title: Murha paratiisissa
programme.desc: Kun saarella tapahtuu kaksi murhaa, josta kummastakin epaillaan paholaisnaamariin pukeutunutta miesta, on poliisivoimilla lahes kirjaimellisesti piru merrassa. Taustalta paljastuu veljesten vihanpitoa.

programme.title: Murha paratiisissa

programme.title: Joanna Lumleyn katketty Karibia

programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin fail to make some instant home-made movie classics.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin fail to make some instant home-made movie classics.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean’s car has broken down and he is late to meet Irma for a night at the opera. Mr Bean finally arrives but he is refused entry to the theatre because of his filthy attire. Forced to borrow some clothes from the local launderette Bean is mistaken for the star of the show and ends up on the stage giving the operatic performance of a lifetime.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When one of the toy cars of his racing track set becomes broken, Mr. Bean decides to buy a new one but since his Mini has a flat tire, he decides to take a taxi. The taxi driver deliberately drives around the town and stops for gas and lunch in the hopes of getting a higher fare. Bean tries to escape, but other passengers mistake Bean as the driver, and Bean reluctantly drives the taxi.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to impress Irma who is infatuated with the hunky deliveryman. Bean tries to improve his physique at the gym but has little success. Instead he opts for an inflatable muscle suit. Irma is indeed impressed and Bean’s plan seems to be working – until the suit gets punctured and Bean makes the mistake of re-inflating it with helium. As Bean floats off into the sky will Irma’s admiration be punctured?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is initially charmed when a seemingly cute seagull turns up on his windowsill. Bean feeds the gull and invites the bird inside. But it’s not long before the seagull in the flat turns out to be a cuckoo in the nest taking over Bean’s home – eating all his food controlling the TV and sleeping in his bed. Bean starts to regret taking on a new best friend in place of good old reliable Teddy.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is very scared on a stormy night and even more so when he hears Mrs Wicket screaming from downstairs. Mr Bean investigates and finds the source of the problem...a rat! Mr Bean offers to help Mrs Wicket rid their house of the troublesome rodent. The only problem is the crafty rat is going nowhere fast and is always one step ahead. Mr Bean looks to inspiration from the Pied Piper but fairy stories don’t always have happy endings.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Puff wants to impress Sushi-Mushi by showing him how he can use his fog to steam food. But Sushi-Mushi thinks Puff wants to be his cooking rival!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and Lilit discover that each of them has a favourite beetle. This is great! They’re beetle buddies! However this quickly turns into a competition on who has the ‘best’ beetle...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Having learnt that Starmush overcame his fear of the Dark Forest by staying a night there when he was a Mushler, Mush-Mush and Lilit convince Chep that they should do the same. But will they end up fearless or fearful?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Mushlers’ home-tree isn’t big enough to store all of Chep’s collections. So Chep goes all around Mushton to find a new home for them – and no way he’s letting them move out without him!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush is the champ of finding Mushables in their version of ‘hide-and-seek’ – ‘Hide your Hat’. The last one he needs to find is Mushpot. But Mushpot is the champ of hiding!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: With Sumush out of town, both Mush-Mush and Fung think that they are now the strongest Mushables in Mushton. But neither of them counts on the strength of Lilit and Miff!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Unwilling to share the food both he and the Lemmings are wild about, Grizzy locks it up inside the rangers brand new and apparently burglar proof safe.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is impressed by the TV show of a magician who transforms a partridge into a bouquet of flowers. To get rid of the Lemmings once and for all, for they exasperate him with their incessant games, Grizzy tries the magic trick on them. And apparently... it works!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Its hot out and when Grizzy sees an ice cream commercial on TV, he has a sudden craving. Unfortunately, the Lemmings made it to the deep-freeze in the garage before him and emptied it out to make themselves a sled run in the backyard with strawberry-vanilla ice cream. For Grizzy, theres no question that the stock they possessively watch over in an icebox winds up as powder snow!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The only edible food item left in the rangers cabin is a gorgeous salmon, which is stuck inside a block of ice at the back of the freezer compartment.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have unearthed a box filled with birthday fountains of light that spit forth giant bursts of sparks. They have a blast straddling these fabulous toys, swirling in every which direction, but their new game is not really compatible with a bears nap.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Wedged in his sofa to relieve his aching back, Grizzy balks at getting up. He designs clever strategies to do everything from a distance, including confiscating the Lemmings radio-controlled toy robot-transformer which he will use as a butler.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The vibrations created by Grizzys snoring during his nap give the Lemmings an idea for a bouncing game. But when Grizzy changes positions and his snoring stops, the Lemmings must find other sources of vibrations. Only these are no longer compatible with Grizzys nap.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a birthday piñata in the rangers living room. The idea of bursting open a papier-mâche statue with a bat like it says in the instructions pleases him.

He tries his best to entertain his fellow passengers but they aren’t very appreciative. How can Mr Bean resolve the situation and get the toy he so desperately wants?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep has come across a new seedpod specimen. Mushpot warns him not to take it though. But the temptation is too much and Chep can’t resist taking the seedpod and opening it… to find it is full of itchy powder! Argh! Mush-Mush and Lilit do their best to help their friend, but it seems like the only way Chep can get rid of the itching is to ask Mushpot for a remedy…

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush can’t wait to show his tricks of forest illusion to everyone.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush is very proud he invented a new game called Fruity Bounce, where he and his friends bounce as high as possible on the bouncier fruits they can find.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mush-Mush discovers that Morel is afraid of the dark, he suggests that Chep, Lilit and he take the Mushlets to their first overnight forest camp

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Because Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit are always up to new adventures, Bolly has dubbed them The Adventurers. Flattered, our friends invite Bolly to choose his challenge to become an Adventurer too. Bolly will have to be the first Mushable to set foot somewhere. Mushton being crowded, Mush-Mush suggests they find an island, somewhere on the giant lake…

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A meteorite falls not far from the cabin. While the Lemmings are sledding outside on a metal pot lid, their sled is abruptly drawn to the extraterrestrial boulder.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have set up a long line of dominos in the cabin that ends with several giant ice blocks and a rocket outside. Weary of not finding the peace and calm he loves so dearly, Grizzy sabotages the game. The rocket hits an ice block and blows up the cabin. Grizzy gets his hands on a machine that can sculpt ice. The bear dreams of an igloo, but the Lemmings have other projects.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find an ice block outside the log cabin that holds a frozen prehistoric animal: a saber-toothed racoon. Softened, the Lemmings free the creature and try to tame it like a kitten. But the raccoon is like a whirlwind. Grizzy wakes up and discovers the cabin topsy-turvy and flies into a rage. But when the bear tries to kick the rodents out, the wild raccoon challenges him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a trunk, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a big chocolate egg with a surprise inside. They are licking their lips. As they fight, they accidentally send the coveted egg flying amidst a group of penguins where a couple of winged creatures adopt it. They sit on the egg as if it were their offspring. Not intimidated, Grizzy and the Lemmings decide to get their hands on it, but the entire bird colony intervenes.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings open a nightclub with blasting music and a disco ball in an igloo they have built not far from the cabin. The noise prevents Grizzy from sleeping. The bear confiscates the disco ball and propels the Lemmings far into the distance. They land in an ice cave where they discover a console that lights up the stars in the sky and controls the northern lights. The canopy of heaven starts blinking. The Lemmings transform the ice field into an open-air discotheque!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings come up with a ride worthy of a county fair in the living room. Awakened, Grizzy throws their juice extractor out the window and the rodents land in the neighboring science station where they accidentally wake up… a mammoth! A friendship is born between them. The Lemmings drag the mastodon into their game, and he transforms the entire cabin into a Ferris Wheel. Grizzy, who was trying to doze in peace, wakes up in a panic.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While Grizzy fishes, a penguin comes over and sees that the bears bucket is empty. He decides to help him and catches piles of fish. Impressed, the bear brings the penguin back to the cabin, where a friendship rapidly strikes up. This pleasant and friendly new companion quickly arouses the Lemmings curiosity. They lure the penguin away on the sly and replace him with another one whos not nearly as clever. Grizzy will quickly see through the trickery.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Just as Grizzy settles into the couch by the fireside, the Lemmings come charging into the living room on their new mount, the vacuum cleaner. Irritated, the bear throws the mechanical charger into the fireplace, which blows up. Freezing air sweeps into the cabin. Seeking a source of heat, Grizzy decides to move into the science station greenhouse where the temperature is controlled by a drone. But the bear is unaware of what he carries in his luggage: the Lemmings!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves Halloween and prepares to give the neighbourhood kids some tricks and treats they won’t forget. But when Mr Bean gets carried away with his spooky pranks he becomes the target of even more fiendish tricks from his neighbours the Bruisers.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is painting a picture of Teddy when he accidently squirts some green paint onto his brown wallpaper. Oh no! Bean needs to redecorate his room fast but ends up painting all the walls a garish lime green instead of brown. He’s so terrified of Mrs Wicket finding out that when he goes to bed he has some very weird nightmares – with a rather sickly ending.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is no fan of wrestling. But he’s promised to take Mrs Wicket and her friend Mrs Wince to a big wrestling match in town. Bean finds himself lost backstage at the stadium and accidentally wanders through a door and straight into the wrestling ring where he finds himself up against Side Kick Rick. More by luck than talent Bean wins the match – only to find that now he has to fight the terrifying Bruise Force.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to see a very rare bird so he can tick off every page in his bird-spotting book. But he soon gets bored as he waits in a hide for the rare bird to appear. Instead he goes home and paints a picture of the bird cuts it out and sticks it high up a tree in the back garden. Soon he is besieged by excited twitchers who think it really is the rare bird. They are all keen to get a snap and they’re willing to pay good money for a peek.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean visits a safari park where he catches the attention of a baby monkey and unknowingly takes the monkey home in his Mini. After hearing on the news that the monkey has been "stolen", Bean attempts to return it without getting caught.

programme.desc: Inspired by a magazine with a jewellery ad showing a man offering a diamond to a woman, Grizzy imagines himself offering the rangers engagement ring to his beloved she-bear.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy gleefully discovers that he can print images taken with the rangers camera which is connected to a state-of-the-art printer. He decides to immortalize and frame himself…

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A van pulls up to the rangers cabin to deliver a crate of jars of chocolate spread. While Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a wrecking bar to open it, someone steals the crate.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: When an Artificial Intelligence takes over the building of a trendy tech company, the gang has to solve the computerized mystery - and maybe learn a lesson about relying too much on technology.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The Gang has seats on the largest airplane ever to fly the open airways! Unfortunately the plane is also beset by a Gremlin bent on sabotaging the flight! The Gang has to step up to solve the airborne mystery as well as deal with something even scarier: Daphne flying a plane!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird sacrifices his stealth muffler tech to sound as loud as the other Batwheels but his modifications backfire when Robin needs his stealthy skills to catch the elusive Catwoman!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bam brings Catwomans Catmobile, Kitty, to life so the Batwheels can have even teams for their game of "Bat-Ball," but the Kitty "Kitty" is too wild to be contained, despite Bams best attempts to convince her to play along.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Beaver Brothers hire The Looney Builders to build them a log cabin, but soon sidetrack the job by goofing around too much.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build a skate park for the kids, but it soon interferes with Hoots Talon and his friends’ activities. / The Looney Builders face underwater challenges as they build a sea school for Moxie Manatee.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean takes Billy to a climbing centre but gets annoyed by a competitive dad who accuses him of being a beginner. Mr Bean insists he’s an expert but is made to prove it when they both compete for a trophy – the winner being the first to climb “The Big One”, a huge, scary wall for adults only! Mr Bean is determined to win but hadn’t counted on the competitive dad’s dirty tricks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean’s landlady is hopping mad on finding molehills on her lovely croquet lawn. Bean looks to get hammered if he does not rid the old lady of the cuddly little half-blind culprit. He fails dismally with his eccentric mole extermination methods and ends up simply taking the pesky rodent for a ride.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is obsessed by his favourite TV hero ‘Super Spy’ and is excited when his very own Super-Spy spy kit arrives in the post. While Mr Bean is pretending to be his favourite character and delighting in all his gadgets he spots some unusual goings on in the Bruisers’ house next door. Naturally Mr Bean assumes the worst and sets out to rectify the situation.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean becomes scoutmaster for the day, but his obsession with badge collecting does not help him make friends.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When theres no milk for his tea and for Teddy, Mr. Bean goes to buy some. However, instead of parking near the grocery store because of the traffic warden, he parks his car at a nearby school where he is mistaken by the principal as the new teacher and is forced to teach a group of juvenile delinquents. But he actually may be a better teacher than he thought.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Tuzki is back as the new intern at the lab. Specs And Skinny has a task for him but Tuzki gets completely lost. Lo and behold, Lamput is just around the corner to help Tuzki complete his mission which is to capture Lamput! Now Tuzki has to return the favour but how will he answer to his bosses?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Specs and Lamput are accidentally taken onboard an alien spaceship! Before the aliens start experimenting on them, they have to find a way to escape. Thank goodness, Skinny and Boss come to the rescue but Specs and Lamput to figure out how to use an alien teleporter. Will they be able to do it before the aliens find them?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Mr. Moustache is on a romantic date with Miss Lipstick during Loi Krathong festival (the famous annual Thailands light festival), an event that nothing must go wrong! However, the Docs and their chase with Lamput keeps getting in the way of the the lovers perfect night out.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: With their endless battles over the rangers cabin which they do not want to share, Grizzy and the Lemmings end up blowing the cabin up. Amidst the debris, they discover a strange pack: an army tent with all the necessary equipment to recreate a "home" in nature. Its the chance to discover the joys of camping in the wild.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings encounter a white bear which has drifted all the way to them on a chunk of ice which is slowly melting. The bear makes a fabulous rodeo partner, he just needs enough ice to keep cool. Even a few ice cubes on his head are enough. The only obstacle to this beautiful friendship is Grizzy, who considers himself master of the fridge and thus of the cabins ice production.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy gets rid of the Lemmings by crushing them with one of the rangers heavy trunks, which he immediately clears out of the cabin, his enemies stuck to it like stickers. What he doesnt know, is that the trunk contains a multifunction drone, complete with joystick and virtual reality headset, which enables "embedded" piloting. Thanks to this cutting-edge technology, the Lemmings decide to regain control of the situation!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover a strange pond in an American Indian grotto that has the power to rejuvenate anyone who dips in it. They spray a bit of the water of youth onto Grizzy and he instantly turns into a harmless cub they can easily rid themselves of. But the effects of the waters are only temporary.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings happen on a native American Indian burial place under the rangers cabin. When they accidentally activate a magic disk representing the earth, they are sent back in time to the prehistoric era...

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A sales representative offers Tom all sorts of materials to finally catch Jerry.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ricks taken up painting to help him relax. Although hes warned them to stay out of his studio, Tom and Jerry inadvertently destroy his first painting. In an effort to reproduce it before he returns home, Tom and Jerry end up in a competition to prove whos the better artist. May the best Renoir win!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry try to locate a dog somewhere in the city, whose barking is keeping them awake.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ricks installed a state-of-the-art home automation system.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ginger accidentally backs her car over Butchs tail. Feeling awful, she brings the alley cat into her home until hes feeling better. Butch is finally getting what hes wanted, much to Toms chagrin, especially now that Gingers having him take care of the poor injured cat. Jerry revels in the situation until he realizes that two idiot cats are more trouble than one and Jerrys getting his butt whooped. Now Jerry must prove that Butch is rehabilitated in order to return him to the alley where he belongs and return his life.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Problems result after Tom and Jerry use too much of a witches disappearance potion.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: While Green Lantern is having his spaceship repaired in the Batcave, the Batwheels want to play with his adorable alien pet, only to discover that this cute critter has wild alien powers!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Poison Ivy uses a rare pollen-spewing flower to put all of Gotham to sleep, its up to Bibi to save her friends and save the day. / Super-genius villain Egghead is on the loose, planning to use Gotham Museum’s famed giant egg to cook up a record-breaking breakfast.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: It’s Christmas Eve, and Fred is ready to solve a Christmas mystery! Unfortunately, the town the gang has arrived in is being attacked by a Pterodactyl, and it doesn’t seem to have anything to do with Christmas!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Daphne brengt de gang mee naar Ierland om het oude kasteel van de Blake-familie te bezoeken. Terwijl de gang onder de indruk raakt van het smaragden eiland, worden ze gedwongen te heroverwegen hoe geweldig de oude mythes en legendes daadwerkelijk zijn door een ontmoeting met een verwoestende reus.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean takes Billy to a climbing centre but gets annoyed by a competitive dad who accuses him of being a beginner. Mr Bean insists he’s an expert but is made to prove it when they both compete for a trophy – the winner being the first to climb “The Big One”, a huge, scary wall for adults only! Mr Bean is determined to win but hadn’t counted on the competitive dad’s dirty tricks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean orders a takeaway pizza but when it arrives he feels let down by the size of it. So he sets out to bake his own unique Teddy shaped pizzas. Under the name Pizza Bean his pizzas become extremely popular and very soon business in booming. As a result rival pizza producer Don Crustyoni sees his profits plummeting and decides to make Mr Bean an offer he can’t refuse.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is not allowed to fly off on holiday as his passport has no photograph. After failing to get one from a photo booth he tries numerous other ways to get his photo taken including photobombing a tourist’s snap. None of these work but after Bean is arrested maybe the police can assist him. Say cheese!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants to impress Irma by entering them both into a dance competition at the local park. But his tango is terrible and his rumba ridiculous so he enrols for lessons at a local dance school. After an unsuccessful class at the dance studio and a trip to the library to teach himself Mr Bean has lost track of time. He needs to make it up to a disgruntled Irma but will his homemade effort ‘win’ her over.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean manages to get himself locked in a department store overnight while spending too long trying on clothes. Bean takes advantage of the situation having fun in the various departments. But when he discovers a robbery taking place the fun and games stop as the desperate burglar chases Bean from floor to floor and all around the store.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While climbing back to the cabin carrying a load of delicious berries, Grizzy trips and falls over backwards. He performs a series of acrobatics worthy of a diving champ and resurfaces safe and sound despite himself. The Lemmings, who saw everything, are in awe and treat Grizzy like an idol. Grizzy starts to enjoy this VIP treatment until the Lemmings ask him to repeat his exploit. Grizzy agrees but discovers that the Lemmings have built a giant diving board for the occasion.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings lose their jar of chocolate spread in a labyrinthian Temple. Determined to recover their favorite afternoon snack, they confront one another in the maze, but end up getting totally lost. Grizzy finds himself back at square one and decides to find something to make holes in the walls and cheat. As for the Lemmings, they discover a magic map of the place that enables you to orient yourself and modify the corridors in real time. Which cheater will win?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Things start to disappear from the log cabin as if by magic. Grizzy is persuaded that the Lemmings are the culprits, but the Lemmings are also victims of inexplicable thefts. As they argue, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the true authors of the repeated thefts: a gang of fanatic partridges who bring stolen objects as offerings to their goddess, a giant partridge. Grizzy and Lemmings join forces to infiltrate the nest and recover their belongings.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A frog swallows an ancestral jewel that bestows it with the power of mind control. Grizzy uses the frog to swallow the flies that have proliferated in the cabin, and which now let themselves be docilely caught. The Lemmings don’t miss a thing. They decide to get hold of the frog to hypnotize an uncooperative tapir who refuses to play rodeo. Grizzy hypnotizes the Lemmings, who become his servants. But several Lemmings escaped and are preparing a rescue mission.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A military convoy has an accident while transporting top-secret material. In the impact, a technological sphere flies out and rolls over to Grizzy, who was gathering berries in the forest. Grizzy realizes that the sphere is a sort of compass that indicates the direction of his desires. He follows it and finds a bush overflowing with his favorite berries. The Lemmings recover the compass to find super game sites in the forest.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a hand-shaped scepter ornated with a gold nugget that covers anything it touches with gold. Grizzy uses the object to “gold leaf” the Lemmings and swipe their chocolate bar. The Lemmings use their golden casts as armors to recover their chocolate. During the combat, the gold nugget is replaced by a chocolate one: the scepter now coats everything with chocolate. The Lemmings snatch it and flee.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize a dance contest where the first prize is a jar of chocolate spread. Grizzy is hungry and decides to participate. He partners up with a talented dancing parrot and wins. Incapable of sharing, Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the prize. The parrot brings the jar to a temple devoted to the glory of dancing parrots. To get it back, Grizzy and the Lemmings must perform a choreography. They decide to rehearse together.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a strange creature fossilized in amber resin that resembles him. A natural science encyclopedia confirms that it’s his ancestor. Grizzy wants to take the block of amber, but the Lemmings fight him for it because the blue animal with big teeth is their ancestor too. The block cracks during their fight and frees the ancestor who turns out to be a rather unmanageable burden.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a strange card game representing the elements along with instructions. The idea is to pretend that the ground is on fire or of ice, like in the game “Floor is Lava.” They transform the cabin into a giant adventure trail. Depending on the card drawn, they must avoid zones on the floor with flames or wax. Grizzy unceremoniously gets rids of the setup to regain control of the cabin. One of the cards lands on a stone slab that transforms into lava. The Lemmings are delighted: they will be able to play “for real”!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom visits a haunted castle where a lovely gardener raises monster plants.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Skullie tells Tom that he wont have to sweat a visit from one of the spooks tonight. However, Tom is soon drawn to a full-length mirror that causes no shortage of trouble. As he gets pulled into the mirror, an evil reflection cat trades places with him. Tuffy and Jerry enter the mirror world too and must fight their reflection selves for survival.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Stinker, the trash-loving dog, comes by looking for help, Tom and Jerry arent inclined to take the case until they hear it involves a missing fortune. So, theyre disappointed when they find out Stinker is searching for a lost fortune cookie from his Chinese takeout to learn his fate. Retracing the dogs steps, they chase the fortune cookies trail through town.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: After Tyke digs up, Hammy, Spikes lucky bone, Spike reburies it right away because its bad luck to remove it. Soon afterward, Tom gets a set of toy dog bones that do tricks, and he teases Spike and Tyke with them. When the whirly-bone buries itself and unearths Hammy for a second time, Spike recruits the other animals to help prevent the bad luck he expects.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A ghost paints a flattering portrait of Tom, but Tom is stingy with his payment and the ghost casts a spell on the portrait. Strange things start happening as the portrait absorbs injuries and calories that should be affecting Tom. However, soon Jerry and Tuffy figure out whats going on and use it to their advantage.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Rick and Ginger are asked to dog-sit for a friends French poodle, Sabrina, Tom is initially on his guard, but soon hes practically eating out of her hand. Next, Spike falls for Sabrina and does everything he can to impress her with how kind he is to Tom. How long will everyones behavior be affected by Sabrinas presence?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom, Jerry and Tuffy have a run-in with a moving suit of armor. The knight scares Tom away, but Jerry makes a brave stand because he thinks the knight is Tom in disguise. Jerry eventually trips the suit of armor and finds out its inhabited by three kittens. Relieved at first, the pets soon realize that battling one haunted knight is nothing compared to battling three real-life kittens.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Jerrys high-born cousin Count DaCalories—a haughty city mouse—visits the estate. At first, he acts sleek and refined, but soon he cant resist pigging out and going on multiple kitchen raids. As his paunch grows, it becomes more and more difficult for him to outrun Tom and stay out of sight of the Duchesss visitor.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: In Catsylvania, the peasant mice oompah band plays onstage at the auditorium. As the bandleaders lovely daughter, Gretta, hits a high note in her rousing song, Tom—in a mask and hood—swings in on a rope and abducts her. Van Mouseling and the peasant band chase him through the rafters and backstage, but Tom escapes with his captive to a subterranean lair. Will the mice manage to free Gretta?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean takes Billy to a climbing centre but gets annoyed by a competitive dad who accuses him of being a beginner. Mr Bean insists he’s an expert but is made to prove it when they both compete for a trophy – the winner being the first to climb “The Big One”, a huge, scary wall for adults only! Mr Bean is determined to win but hadn’t counted on the competitive dad’s dirty tricks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When nursing an injured magpie in his room, Mr. Bean learns something the rest of us already know: magpies can’t help stealing anything that sparkles. When the police arrive to investigate the theft of his landlady’s jewellery, it’s not just Mr. Bean that needs to take flight.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: While Mr. Bean is taking photos of wildlife, he sees big footprints belonging to a dinosaur. He starts running away but then gets an idea to take a photo of these footprints, hoping hell become famous. However, the dinosaur turns out to be part of a set for a movie called Jurassic Hero and Bean is added to the cast.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean accidently causes Mrs Wicket to be hospitalised and in need of a wheelchair. Back home Mr Bean has thoughtfully set up a bell service so that he can be at Mrs Wicket’s beck and call at any time of day or night. Mrs Wicket likes this...a lot. The bell doesn’t stop ringing and an exhausted Mr Bean finds himself running up and down the stairs carrying and fetching until he eventually loses patience with his patient.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Grundy, a giant monster truck, causes chaos as he stomps around Gotham and creates a mess. / When MOE creates a new, super sparkly vehicle paint, the Batwheels decide to put on a talent show to see who will get a shiny new makeover!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When MOE creates a new, super sparkly vehicle paint, the Batwheels decide to put on a talent show to see who will get a shiny new makeover! / To ease the burden on MOE, the Batwheels use his duplicating machine to make copies of their repair bot, but the Batcave is soon overrun when the machine breaks!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: To ease the burden on MOE, the Batwheels use his duplicating machine to make copies of their repair bot, but the Batcave is soon overrun when the machine breaks!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Super-genius villain Egghead is on the loose, planning to use Gotham Museums famed giant egg to cook up a record-breaking breakfast.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Marvin the Martian hires The Looney Builders to build an outer space ball court on Mars. Bugs is a big fan of the sport, and soon becomes a ball and build “hog.”

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build their headquarters a car wash. Daffy doesn’t want to wash Dumpy and goes to extreme lengths to keep him dirty and preserve their memories.

programme.title: Barneys World - Meet Barney
programme.desc: Billy takes us on a tour all around the park while riding his scooter! Follow along as he shows off some of his coolest moves.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is persuaded that hes discovered the ultimate gadget for good living: a pair of connected glasses for watching TV in panoramic view, with all sorts of indicators, namely an intrusion warning signal. There is only one real drawback: the speedometer function which the Lemmings adore.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings clamor for their turn to play with the rangers mobile phone, but Grizzy isnt in the sharing mood. And hes very talented at flattening anything that comes near, without looking up from his game. The Lemmings invent an implacable protection system which should enable them to recover the mobile in complete safety.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is captivated by a mime artist on TV who makes viewers believe in the presence of an invisible wall. To get rid of the Lemmings, who have sights on his jar of Yummy, Grizzy hides the jar and pretends he has an invisible one. When the Lemmings see through the trick, they decide to trap Grizzy with a grand illusion number.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings shiver with cold, sneeze and are glassy-eyed: they have a big fat cold! They look so pitiful that Grizzy doesnt have the heart to throw them into the void, even if they are extremely annoying when they try to snuggle up to him to keep warm. He decides to heal them: the quicker they get better, the quicker Grizzy will be able to get rid of them pitilessly.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a pack of icy mints that literally chill your breath. One blast from anyone who eats them freezes everything in sight. Grizzy does not particularly care for this frosty ambiance and tries to take their candy away.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy cant believe it: he has just swallowed a spoonful of his favorite food, chocolate spread, and he hates it! How could that be possible? And yet, when he swiped the jar from the Lemmings, they seemed to be enjoying it immensely. A quick investigation reveals that the Lemmings added a dash of lemon juice to the jar to give the spread a sharper taste. And they intend to jazz up the rest of the stock as well!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput, The Docs, The Thief and Droopy are all approaching the end of a typical day - the Docs are chasing Lamput, the thief has achieved the perfect gallery art heist and Droopy has finished his day at the office. But an unexpected collision causes confusion when their briefcases get muddled up and they each end up with each others belongings. Its’ not long before they find out about the mistake, but who has whose stuff? And how will they get it back?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs pursuit of Lamput takes them to the North Pole, where Lamput is taking photographs of arctic wildlife. The Docs decide to disguise themselves as various animals to get close to Lamput, only to be thwarted each time by the same animals they’re pretending to be, including a polar bear mother and her cub.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: A freak accident causes Lamput to grow giant in size! The two Docs must find a way to deal with this gargantuan problem and catch him roaming the big city!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is waiting for Irma at the park for a picnic, when he sees a nervous man rehearsing an engagement proposal to his girlfriend. Mr Bean tries to show him how it’s done but manages to send the engagement ring flying! It lands in a bicycle basket, gets flicked into a pram, flung onto an ice cream - Mr Bean has to chase it around the park as it keeps being launched from place to place, in the hope he can save the day!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean races his neighbor to grow a giant marrow, chasing prize money and a photo in the papers—but chaos and comedy ensue along the way.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he cant. Next morning, and after an awful nights sleep, he goes to buy a brand-new bed. He has fun trying all the beds out, but the one he wants is too expensive. He is about to get thrown out of the shop when he turns his experience of all the beds to his advantage.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat; and wait outside in the car until theyre done. Bean gets bored, so bored that he decides to sneak into the spa and get Mrs. Wicket and Miss Wince out. Chased by the irate Receptionist, Bean gets more than he bargained for when he crashes into Mrs. Wickets massage session.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Daphne agrees to watch her friends kid, Wayne, and convinces Fred to take a night off from mysteries to go to the boardwalk amusement park. Unbeknownst to her, though, the park is being haunted by a fiendish clown, Madcap.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang goes on a camping trip, although they cant really agree on why. Freds desire for the gang to get in touch with their natural instincts and hones their mystery skills, turns into on-the-job training as Viking Ghosts attack and attempt to drive them away – or worse.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom enlists the help of the lake monster to terrorize the mouse village forcing Jerry Van Mouseling to intervene and save the day.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Mice visitors from Mars force Tom to change the way he treats Jerry.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tom inadvertently set a Yeti loose on the town Jerry Van Mouseling must subdue the beast.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom turns into a Blob monster, and proceeds to eat everything in sight – including the village mice! Jerry Van Mouseling to the rescue!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Rick and Ginger leave town with instructions for Tom to keep the house in order, but Jerrys got other ideas.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Madcap slapstick and mayhem as the celebrated cat and mouse plot against each other.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy sets sail with his fishing gear. But he has no intention of fishing: its a scheme to enjoy a jar of Yummy chocolate spread alone in peace. The Lemmings sense the subterfuge and sink his boat to get the treat, which sinks to the ocean depths. The characters dive in pursuit and discover a school of intelligent crabs that live in an underwater city. Their treasure is a substance that’s even yummier than Yummy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find the cabin upside down. Upon closer inspection, it looks like an epic battle took place there. And Grizzy isnt here. The curious Lemmings start imagining what could have happened, visualizing the most improbable scenes for us. They decide to follow their lead to find Grizzy and confirm their zany theories.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wants to watch TV in peace. The Lemmings have other plans: they want to have fun playing music with homemade instruments. Exasperated by the racket theyre making in the garage, Grizzy destroys the instruments and sends the Lemmings flying. The Lemmings discover a magic ukulele that bewitches anyone who hears its music: the perfect tool to regain control of the cabin and get back to their concert.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy cant sleep because its too hot. He decides to confiscate the fans the Lemmings use to power their fake spaceship. Totally into their Space Opera game, the Lemmings try to repel the alien Grizzy with "laser" party favors and are propelled onto an "unknown planet": a volcano crater with a secret base where a rocket is ready to take off. The rocket carries the cabin into space. Its no longer a game: Grizzy and the Lemmings will have to face the dangers of outer space!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy uses insecticide and a fly swatter to get rid of vermin that are bothering him during his siesta. The Lemmings heal his last victim: a cute little insect they adopt as their house pet. Only problem, their starving mascot only eats wood! The cabin has lots of it, but when Grizzy realizes that an insect is eating his home from the inside, he takes drastic measures to eliminate it permanently.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is too hot and proposes the Lemmings an exchange: their ventilator, which they use to propel their skateboard in the air, for a baby ostrich Grizzy found outside the cabin and who can tow them. The Lemmings are delighted to play with their new baby friend who is overflowing with energy. But the baby’s parents have a different outlook and do not want their son taking risks. Thinking that Grizzy is the Lemmings’ father, they hold him accountable.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Thanks to a mysterious bag of magic beans, Bugs meets Elmer, a gentle giant who would like to build a castle in the clouds; its the perfect mission for DIYers.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Fosse Ferret hires The Looney Builders to build a stage for the kids’ dance recital. / It’s Taz’s birthday, so The Looney Builders build him a huge ice cream sundae.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Mayor Leghorn to build the venue for the Looney Games. They soon become overwhelmed by the job and must ask for help.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Pete Puma hires The Looney Builders to build a roller disco for Looneyburg. Lola is new to roller skating, but doesn’t want to take it slow and practice.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Petunia’s Grandpa Oink to upgrade his farm. They take things too far, and Grandpa Oink misses some of the things he loves most about farming.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Buff makes a wish on a magic artifact for the other Batwheels to be turned into monster trucks, just like him! The rest of the Batwheels must learn how to use their big new bodies to undo the wish!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi just can’t put down her new exciting video game, even when MOE needs her help packing Bam’s utility belt for a mission. / Buff tries to show Batwing how great it is to volunteer to help Gothams needy, but the Legion of Zoom get in the way.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Buff tries to show Batwing how great it is to volunteer to help Gothams needy, but the Legion of Zoom get in the way.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Condiment King takes advantage of no Batwheels being on patrol to unleash a barrage of ketchup and mustard on an unsuspecting Gotham.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When King Tut steals an ancient artifact that makes his Carcophagus magically fast, MOE equips Bam with rocket boosters to catch the villain and Bam must learn how to control all that speed.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Now that Catwoman has equipped Kitty with wings, Batwing tries to teach the easily-distracted Kitty how to fly. / When Harley Quinn’s Hyena goes missing, Bibi agrees to help Jestah look for her.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: It is a nice sunny day and Mr. Bean and Mrs. Wicket are relaxing in the garden, Mr. Bean attempts to sit beside her in the cool shade of her outdoor umbrella but Mrs. Wicket refuses. He decides to design his own umbrella for himself and Teddy. As he starts digging, he discovers - to his surprise - a bomb. He tries to disarm it, unfortunately, his attempt only accelerates its countdown.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to the theatre to see a performance by a celebrated hypnotist Dr Daze. Bean is super keen to come up on stage and be part of the show. But after being hypnotized Bean unknowingly leaves the theatre not realizing that he is still under the influence and certain trigger sounds have him doing silly things at unexpected and embarrassing moments.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After a stubborn bird deliberately defecates his Mini, Mr. Bean washes it. After the passing motorist mistakenly thinks that Bean runs a car wash, Bean makes some makeshift car washing equipment at the side of the road. Mrs. Wicket joins Bean by offering tea to the motorist. Soon after, Bean is washing cars that belong to the Royal Queen but the same bird defecates on the car.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean chases Scrapper around Mrs Wickets flat but her sideboard tumbles over, and when Bean sees a bit of fur poking out from under it, he is horrified to think he has squashed poor Scrapper. Not realising that it is only his landladys furry hat, Bean rushes what he thinks is a flattened cat across town to the vet in a desperate attempt to save his feline friends life.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean plays gooseberry when Mrs Wicket falls in love with a man Mr Bean doesn’t trust.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is super happy to have Amanita become a collector as well. Until she starts getting better at collecting than he is!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Our Mushlers discover a super-sticky tree sap and use it to have lots of fun… until Mush-Mush gets stuck to Muddler’s back.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When things go missing from everyone’s home-trees, our Mushlers get on the case to catch the culprit.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Morel notices a Mushlet who is too shy to join in with the others. He realizes why the Mushlet is so shy -- they are in awe of Mush-Mush. Morel gets Mush-Mush to boost the Mushlets confidence.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep discovers he is great at giving snails massages. But the Food and Travel Snails now want massages all the time. Exhausting! Chep has to learn how to tell them NO!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush goes on an adventure with Morel and Sushi-Mushi. He worries he wont be cool enough to fit in with the older Mushables, so makes Chep come along for support.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Inside a mysterious cave Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a magical Game of the Goose. / Grizzy is bothered by an object stuck in between the sofa cushions: a big fur lemming puppet glove. / Grizzy discovers the leftovers of a Halloween party in the rangers cabin which was entirely redecorated for the occasion. / Grizzy wants to give the she-bear hes in love with a plastic ring which he finds really swell.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is bothered by an object stuck in between the sofa cushions: a big fur lemming puppet glove. He puts his hand inside and has fun pretending that the puppet is strangling him. The Lemmings believe that the puppet is a Super Lemming whos stronger than Grizzy and start to obey it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the leftovers of a Halloween party in the rangers cabin, which was entirely redecorated for the occasion, with stupefaction. But if the curious ambiance perturbs Grizzy, the Lemmings are in seventh heaven and have a whale of a time jumping up and down inside a cooking pot full of marshmallows. Grizzy wants to get rid of it until he accidentally swallows a marshmallow and discovers the best flavor of his life.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wants to give the she-bear hes in love with a plastic ring which he finds really swell. But since the object was found in the trash, he needs to wash it first. And the Lemmings are using the sole bar of soap in the house as a bobsleigh.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a strange American Indian figurine with the power to switch the spirits of two living beings and finds himself imprisoned in the body of a caribou. He immediately tries to activate the reverse procedure, but the Lemmings steal the figurine in order to turn into a partridge and fly away.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While salmon fishing on the riverbank, Grizzy hauls in an unusual catch: an old hand mirror straight out of a fairytale. Instead of showing the reflection of the person who holds it, the mirror shows an idealized vision of his surroundings. Whether it be Grizzy or the Lemmings, everyone sees the world of his dreams, and no one wants to share it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a casing that fell from a circus caravan, the Lemmings find a magic stick that can enchant objects and make them come alive. Grizzy is sure that a stick like that would save him a lot of work, the only problem is how to get it from the Lemmings, who have become sorcerers apprentices?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Whilst trying to stop the Lemmings from playing with a crate of firework rockets Grizzy is literally carried away with them when the largest specimen shoots off

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: With their endless battles over the rangers cabin which they do not want to share, Grizzy and the Lemmings end up blowing the cabin up. Amidst the debris, they discover a strange pack: an army tent with all the necessary equipment to recreate a "home" in nature. Its the chance to discover the joys of camping in the wild.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings encounter a white bear which has drifted all the way to them on a chunk of ice which is slowly melting. The bear makes a fabulous rodeo partner, he just needs enough ice to keep cool. Even a few ice cubes on his head are enough. The only obstacle to this beautiful friendship is Grizzy, who considers himself master of the fridge and thus of the cabins ice production.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to the theatre to see a performance by a celebrated hypnotist Dr Daze. Bean is super keen to come up on stage and be part of the show. But after being hypnotized Bean unknowingly leaves the theatre not realizing that he is still under the influence and certain trigger sounds have him doing silly things at unexpected and embarrassing moments.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After a stubborn bird deliberately defecates his Mini, Mr. Bean washes it. After the passing motorist mistakenly thinks that Bean runs a car wash, Bean makes some makeshift car washing equipment at the side of the road. Mrs. Wicket joins Bean by offering tea to the motorist. Soon after, Bean is washing cars that belong to the Royal Queen but the same bird defecates on the car.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean chases Scrapper around Mrs Wickets flat but her sideboard tumbles over, and when Bean sees a bit of fur poking out from under it, he is horrified to think he has squashed poor Scrapper. Not realising that it is only his landladys furry hat, Bean rushes what he thinks is a flattened cat across town to the vet in a desperate attempt to save his feline friends life.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean plays gooseberry when Mrs Wicket falls in love with a man Mr Bean doesn’t trust.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves Halloween and prepares to give the neighbourhood kids some tricks and treats they won’t forget. But when Mr Bean gets carried away with his spooky pranks he becomes the target of even more fiendish tricks from his neighbours the Bruisers.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is painting a picture of Teddy when he accidently squirts some green paint onto his brown wallpaper. Oh no! Bean needs to redecorate his room fast but ends up painting all the walls a garish lime green instead of brown. He’s so terrified of Mrs Wicket finding out that when he goes to bed he has some very weird nightmares – with a rather sickly ending.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Truff is happy. He has found a necklace that makes him even Truffier! Except he had no idea the necklace belongs to Starmush. And the Mushelder promised there will be consequences for whoever took it. Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit now have to save Truff from being consequenced…

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit is under pressure. Truff, the most talented musician in Mushton, has invited her, Mush-Mush and Chep to form a band with him. Only problem is they can hardly play music! Truff insists: they just need to relax and feel the groove. But when Truff tells his new band they will perform at the Food Snail, Lilit isn’t relaxed at all!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Because he has won the moss-ball game last year, Puff is in charge of organizing this Summer’s Picnic. Only Puff isn’t comfortable in that role. Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit offer to help and make sure all the Mushables will follow Puff’s lead. Gradually, Puff gains confidence and ends up bossing everyone around. Now, all the Mushables are about to flee the Picnic!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit notice that Mushpie seems in great shape lately. They want to feel as great as she does and try to discover her secret.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Chep asks Mush-Mush and Lilit to go storm-watching and they refuse, Lilit feels bad and convinces Mush-Mush to join their friend.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
