programme.desc: The Lemmings have a new playmate: a walrus! The rodents ride the creature throughout the cabin, then make him slide down the roof before starting all over again.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When Grizzy goes fishing, the Lemmings jump on the opportunity to transform the cabin into a giant ice slide. Upon his return, the bear puts an end to the rodents bobsleigh party and gets ready to savor his days catch. But the Lemmings steal his fish and draw the bear outside the cabin. Grizzy must try to recover his lunch while protecting his territory from a rodent invasion.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy pinches a magic statue from the Lemmings that has the power to make objects appear in real life. All you have to do, is pin the photo of ones desires upon it. Too bad for the rodents snow-bike! Grizzy replaces the vehicles photo with the portrait of his beloved she-bear who stayed behind in Canada. Barely arrived in African, the she-bear disappears again, victim of the rodents trickery. It is the outbreak of a bitter dispute.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Annoyed by the Lemmings new magnetic train, Grizzy propels the whole lot of them far from the cabin. The rodents land in the neighboring hut of a sorcerer and a mysterious mask falls onto one of them, endowing him with the power of telekinesis. The Lemmings are thrilled! They return to the cabin to explore this new magic power. Perched upon pieces of furniture, they fly around the room to finish their life-size flying train game!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy chases after the Lemmings, who have loaded a jar of Yummy into their remote-control driven car. Where the bear gets to the gas station, he destroys the vehicle and recovers the chocolate spread. The rodents find little mini-cars and chase Grizzy all the way back to the cabin, where they trip him up and intercept the coveted jar. Helpless, the bear sets out after them, until he runs into a tank truck filled with Yummy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: To recover the jar of Yummy that Grizzy confiscated from them, the Lemmings decide to infest the bears coat with fleas.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wakes up starving but the cupboards are empty. While the Lemmings play nearby with an elephant, the bear swipes their peanut reserves. Not at all pleased, the rodents decide to recover their bag of nuts and use the elephants trunk like a powerful vacuum cleaner to hurl all sorts of objects at Grizzy. In the heat of the battle, the Lemmings discover a pack of fabulous peanut and chili pepper cookies that seem to make the pachyderm ultra-powerful.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is about to start eating the last remaining food in the cabin: cocktail snacks. But the sly Lemmings get there first. A fight breaks out but is quickly cut short by the unexpected visit of a wart hog. The pig devours the crackers and then, using his snout, detects a forgotten old package of candy under the bed, which he also proceeds to gobble down. Everyone realizes that the creature has the ability to find food. Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over who will follow the beast to track down food.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In order to win a trophy filled with Yummy candies, Grizzy and the Lemmings take part in a safari photo competition on an animal reserve. They must capture the portraits of a number of wild animals that live in the park. It requires all their cunning to approach the elephant, wart hog and bat and take photos for the contest. But when it comes to the super-speedy, blue-necked ostrich, its a different kettle of fish!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While Grizzy organizes a picnic alongside the pond, the Lemmings steal his jar of Yummy using water balls to discreetly advance underwater. Despite their equipment, the bear surprises the Lemmings and traps the rodents inside a waterproof ball which he throws far into the distance. An ostrich mistakes the ball for her egg and sits on it, waiting for the egg to hatch. The Lemmings are adopted by this new mother who is prepared to do anything to satisfy her offspring!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean fancies a game of golf so he creates his own golf course inside his flat and invites Irma to join him for a round. Their somewhat eccentric game takes them from sitting room to bathroom and through Mrs Wicket’s flat as they battle to be the winner of the First Bean Open Championship.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A crafty cat burglar is causing alarm and concern throughout the town with a series of daring rooftop robberies. After Mrs Wickets house is burgled and Bean has his wallet stolen he decides the only way to deal with this cunning housebreaker is to don a costume and become a superhero (like the ones in his favourite comic book). But Super Bean soon finds he has his hands full helping to rescue cats stuck in trees and old ladies with their spilled shopping.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is tidying his flat and chucking out a load of old unwanted junk. Unfortunately during the big clear out Teddy accidentally falls into a bin bag which gets put out in the street. Bean is horrified when the rubbish van arrives and he realises that dear old Teddy is now on his way to the landfill. Bean races across town to the dump but how will he ever find his friend amongst all the mountains of junk?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys a robot to clean his flat but it ends up trashing half the town.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants an ice cream from the ice cream van but ends up serving himself – along with every kid in town.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Like usual, Grizzy picks the door of the Rangers log cabin to come in and make himself comfortable, but this time its impossible to enter! The Lemmings have requisitioned the cabin for a party and barricaded themselves inside. Grizzy has no intention of waiting for an invitation to find a way to get in.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have got their hands on a pack of white beans which have very strange properties: when mixed with soda, anyone who eats them turns into a bouncing ball.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a blast with a bowling game they found in the Rangers storeroom. Grizzy hastens to destroy the pins to ensure his peace and quiet. But the Lemmings discover a remote-control device that can modify the balls weight. By setting it on maximum, the ball could knock over much more than pins: furniture, a bear and even a log cabin!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings inherit a crate that fell off a Canadian army convoy. Inside, a case emits a sort of laser beam that divides objects into multiple miniaturized versions of themselves.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Near the supermarket a machine hands out surprise eggs in exchange for a coin. Amongst the lots to be won, there is a super firework rocket the Lemmings dream of, and a piece of costume jewelry that Grizzy imagines himself giving to his lady-love.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a high-tech gadget that enables you to learn anything within seconds. He can now become the perfect bear!

programme.title: Moley
programme.desc: Manny wants to play some games, but all Squirm wants to do is paint. Manny decides to take things into his own hands when Squirm refuses to play along.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: When a rich man writes Scooby into his will, the gang must spend a night in his creepy mansion with kooky relatives and a spooky phantom to collect Scoobys share.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Shaggy en Scooby ontdekken hun nieuwe lievelingseten wanneer de gang onderzoek doet naar het mysterie van een angstaanjagende voetballer die ronddwaalt in een snackfabriek!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Everyone assumes that Harley Quinn is the culprit in a recent burglary. But as Batman and Bam pursue Harley, Bibi and Redbird begin to suspect that she may actually be innocent.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When the Legion of Zoom plan to cheat their way to winning the Gotham Grand Prix, the Batwheels zoom into action to ensure the race is won the right way - fair and square !

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: As The Looney Builders build Kathy Bat an upside-down radio station, Porky has concerns but doesn’t speak up.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Queen Beatrice hires The Looney Builders to build a workshop in her beehive where there is one rule the crew has trouble following.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is waiting for Irma at the park for a picnic, when he sees a nervous man rehearsing an engagement proposal to his girlfriend. Mr Bean tries to show him how it’s done but manages to send the engagement ring flying! It lands in a bicycle basket, gets flicked into a pram, flung onto an ice cream - Mr Bean has to chase it around the park as it keeps being launched from place to place, in the hope he can save the day!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The clumsy hero is kept awake by the deafening sound of roadworks outside his bedroom window, but a plot to restore peace by feeding the workmen goes spectacularly wrong.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is in the library studying his family heritage. Someone brings to his attention Mr Bean’s resemblance to a certain Lord Bean. Mr Bean sets off to track down his ancestral home (a castle) in Scotland where he is welcomed with open arms. But owning a castle is not cheap. Can Mr Bean escape before he runs out of money and has there been a case of mistaken identity?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and his beloved car find themselves in a crash for crash battle with his arch nemesis the Reliant Robin. It’s a contest to find out who can hold their nerve the longest. Does Mr Bean win? Is his car left unscathed? And more importantly do we find out who the driver of the Reliant Robin really is?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has got everything ready for Irma’s birthday; card cake candles but he just needs to get her some flowers. But nothing goes to plan as Mr Bean inadvertently causes a car crash involving a bride on her wedding day. There’s no time to lose as Mr Bean promises he’ll get the bride to the church on time. Irma is not a happy lady as Mr Bean is distracted by the task in hand.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput escapes the Lab and the unenviable task of orange-blob-retrieval falls to Specs and Skinny. The Boss equips them with increasingly expensive vehicles. The real issue might be staffing.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs pursue Lamput across a vast desert. Things go wrong and all three end up stranded with no way to call for help. Stuck with each other, the trio roam the desert as days turn into years and the Docs grow old. One day, they find a map that leads to a Fountain of Youth and a way out of the desert, but can they survive the journey across the harsh, sand sea?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs finally catch Lamput! Mission accomplished…and now they have nothing to do. Every other job to catch lab experiments gone rogue is a piece of cake compared to Lamput. Realizing that they’ve lost their lives’ purpose, Specs and Skinny decide to break Lamput out of the lab’s hi-tech prison so that they can go back to catching him again.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a phial containing a love potion: anyone who drinks it immediately falls in love with the first creature he sees. Grizzy already imagines himself becoming irresistible in the eyes of his beloved she-bear. But that is without taking into account the Lemmings... clumsiness, and their rodeo caribou drinking the magic potion.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings notice that Grizzy moves away from the jar of chocolate spread whenever he chases the fly buzzing around him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the ranger’s collection of bird calls by chance. With a simple blow of the whistle, he can attract a flock of partridges that are at his beck and call.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While fighting over a jar of chocolate spread, Grizzy and the Lemmings set off a chain reaction which sends the jar flying into space, where it damages a space station.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Even for a giant seven foot bear, its not easy getting rid of pesky lemmings but its all fun seeing them constantly try to outsmart each other with cheeky plans.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wants to try out the brand new packaging format of chocolate spread that he discovers in the rangers cupboard: a yummy-looking XXL jar. And he does not intend to share it with the Lemmings. After observing a chameleon toad that is able to blend into its surroundings, the Lemmings decide to make themselves invisible to attain Grizzys treasure.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Its Toms wedding day! Hes getting married to Toodles in a backyard wedding that were experiencing through the eyes of his best friend, Jerry. Puuuuurfeeecttt in every way, then the crap hits the mouse hole: Tom is given Jerry as a wedding gift. When it cant possibly get worse Jerry wakes up and tosses Toodles out of the house!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Jerry is left alone in an empty house after Rick, Ginger and Tom are nowhere to be seen.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry listen to the tale of a cat who met his unfortunate end chasing a superior opponent.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: We open on a SOLD sign in front of what will be Rick and Gingers house. Inside, the house is empty – no Rick, no Ginger, no Tom, no furniture. Just Jerry, who slip slides merrily across the bare floors – the place all to himself. That is until the front door opens and Rick and Ginger arrive in their new home. Ginger screams having just seen a mouse and tells Rick to get Tom out of the moving van. Like most cats in a new place, Tom doesnt want to come out from beneath the recently placed couch, but Ginger demands he catch that mouse! And so we watch the beginning of a lifelong adversarial relationship unfold one gag at a time!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry are in the middle of it when Tom hears someone singing the tale of a cat who met his unfortunate, painful end chasing a much superior opponent. The song is about underestimating your opponent. Every time Tom stops chasing Jerry, the music stops. When Tom resumes, the music resumes. This back and forth continues until the chase takes Tom right past a Singing Uncle Pecos. Tom skids to a stop causing Uncle Pecos to stop singing. Tom wants to prove the lyrics of Uncle Pecos song wrong, but in the end, Toms ego proves to everyone, including himself, that he is very much the subject of Uncle Pecos cautionary tale.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: After another attempt on Jerrys part to elude Tom, Jerry overhears Rick and Ginger talk about the possibility of getting rid of that "useless cat." When Ginger sounds like shes considering the possibility, Jerry cant believe his ears!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After snagging an ultra-fuel-cell upgrade, the Ducky Boat suddenly becomes the fastest vehicle in Gotham. Later, confident leader Bam must rally the Batwheels to stop the turbo-Ducky!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Buff befriends Mr Freezes snowcrawler Snowy, the other Batwheels bristle at the thought of hanging out with a "bad guy" so Buff sets out to change their minds.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang enters the heart of the American Gothic South in order to help an attractive farmer who Fred wants to impress with his mystery-solving prowess. A horrifying Scarecrow has come to life and attempts to drive everyone off his farm.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang is honored to take part in the wedding of two close friends. But can Best Man Shaggy and Maid of Honor Daphne save their friend’s perfect day before it’s ruined by a tragic Ghost Bride bent on destroying everyone else’s happily ever after?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is waiting for Irma at the park for a picnic, when he sees a nervous man rehearsing an engagement proposal to his girlfriend. Mr Bean tries to show him how it’s done but manages to send the engagement ring flying! It lands in a bicycle basket, gets flicked into a pram, flung onto an ice cream - Mr Bean has to chase it around the park as it keeps being launched from place to place, in the hope he can save the day!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wickets nephew. He decides he must have his own console, only to discover how expensive they are. But as luck would have it, he arrives at the shop at closing time to discover that tomorrow there will be a special sale. All he has to do is be first in line.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean dog-sits for Irma and while in the park comes across a professional dog-walker. This guy’s making a fortune while Bean is doing it for free! That evening posters go up and the next morning Bean has four dogs to look after. But who is going to walk whom?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean ends up in a farm slurry pit after racing a tractor. The car smells Teddy smells Bean smells … bad. He comes home determined to clean all three. A determination that winds up with him locked outside on the roof and completely stark naked.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover a very particular cocoa tree with chocolate-spread sap! Reduced to eating canned Brussels sprouts, the only remaining food in the cabin, Grizzy is baffled when he sees the Lemmings parading past to equip themselves with all sorts of containers: ladles, soup spoons, bowls, buckets, basins, etc. He watches them through binoculars and discovers that they have planted a faucet in a tree where chocolate spread flows. Grizzy decides to siphon off their tree.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy expels the Lemmings from the cabin where they had built a cumbersome obstacle course. Peaceful at last and feeling lazy, he is determined not to leave his couch. The Lemmings discover a magic Mayan disc that allows you to choose instantaneous mutations of other animals’ features: bat wings, reindeer antlers, elephant trunks, etc. The mutant Lemmings return to the cabin, determined to continue playing their game while enjoying their new accessories.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: As they fight over the last jar of chocolate spread, Grizzy and the Lemmings accidentally send it flying deep into the jungle. They both set out in search for the jar, but in a forest that dense, it’s an impossible mission. In a Mayan Temple, the Lemmings discover a magic bracelet that increases one’s sense of smell tenfold and use it to find the jar. Grizzy loses their trail, but finds some Mayan bracelets himself: one for eyesight and one for hearing. Enough to infallibly track down the Lemmings!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Just as Grizzy is about to go to bed, he ousts the Lemmings who are holding a surprise party in the cabin. The Lemmings land in a Mayan Temple devoted to the moon. While toying with an ancestral console, the Lemmings set off a cosmic phenomenon that brings the moon, which is now the size of a disco ball, to the temple. In its aura, gravity becomes very weak. Enough to get rid of Grizzy and have a very original fiesta.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy does his best to get rid of the Lemmings and enjoy some peace and quiet in the cabin, but each time they come back with a new and even more-disturbing activity. When he sees some penguins marching in a perfectly disciplined line, Grizzy decides to teach the Lemmings how to behave in his presence. He locks himself up with them inside the garage, which has been transformed into an elementary school classroom. Grizzy is determined to make discipline reign but he has forgotten about the Lemming’s natural penchant for bedlam.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight once again and cause an accident with Santa Claus’ sled. The Lemmings rush to the crash site and get their hands on Santa’s magic bag. While Grizzy is tidying up the cabin after their fight, he is baffled to see the Lemmings come back him, quiet and calm. The rodents break out into Christmas carols and prepare a delicious snack for Grizzy before slipping out again. Suspicious, Grizzy follows them and discovers that the bag rewards persons whose wishes are equal to their goodwill.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings do not agree on which program to watch on TV. Grizzy confiscates the remote-control device. He thinks he’s won the battle, but the Lemmings find another one at the research station. A furious combat begins until the adversaries realize that the research station device has a special button that controls objects.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a blast racing down the ice slope in competition with the stuffed Bear-Ranger and manage to win each time. Grizzy cannot stand seeing his avatar humiliated and he decides to enter the competition to help him. Their frenzied descent gets out of hand and everyone is propelled all the way to the hangar of the research station, where they discover an ultra-sophisticated racing game. The racecourse sprawls over the entire icefield via drones that project holographic elements. Grizzy and the Lemmings get into super-fast snowmobiles and launch into the race of the century.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy watches the Lemmings shave ice from the icefield and whip it into granita, but the result is flavorless. He decides to make granita in an empty jar of Yummy so that the chocolate left over on the sides of the jar will flavor the dessert. It’s delicious! The Lemmings, who consider it was their recipe, swap the chocolate granita with another one made in an old flowerpot with potting soil. The choco-granito race is off and running!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: After Tom drifts off to sleep, a tumbleweed blows into his face, and he discovers that the kitchen looks like an old west saloon. The bartender, Spike, and customers recognize him as the Catnip Kid. Then he sees himself in the mirror—dressed like a gunslinger, a silver-plated pea shooter holstered to his hip! Will Sherriff Jerry bring him to justice in this western adventure?

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom blows on a trumpet to dislodge Jerry from his hiding place, which leads to Frankie the rat convincing Tom hes a great trumpeter. Frankie plays manager, Jerry joins in as percussionist, and they audition neighborhood animals for a third member of their jazz trio. Unfortunately, when Spike is chosen on the upright double bass, rivalries spark up and nerves threaten the trios success.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Overweight Jerry starts working out on a weight machine supplied to him by cousin Muscles. Not to be outdone, Tom starts lifting weights as well – which sets up an epic Battle Royale between the cat and mouse.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry are forced to go back to Detective School in order to renew their detective licenses.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A werewolf terrorizes Tom and the inhabitants of the Catsylvania village.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Toms obsession with the sound his new crinkle ball drives the rest of the household crazy, forcing them to take drastic measures to rid the house of the annoying toy.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry are hired to find a missing priceless Maltese Pigeon.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom enlists the help of the lake monster to terrorize the mouse village forcing Jerry Van Mouseling to intervene and save the day.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Mice visitors from Mars force Tom to change the way he treats Jerry.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is waiting for Irma at the park for a picnic, when he sees a nervous man rehearsing an engagement proposal to his girlfriend. Mr Bean tries to show him how it’s done but manages to send the engagement ring flying! It lands in a bicycle basket, gets flicked into a pram, flung onto an ice cream - Mr Bean has to chase it around the park as it keeps being launched from place to place, in the hope he can save the day!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: After a head-on collision with the milkman, Mr. Beans landlady isrushed to hospital, leaving him to look after her odious one-eyed cat Scrapper. Fur isnt the only thing that flies and in the end its Bean that needs looking after.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean’s car has broken down and he is late to meet Irma for a night at the opera. Mr Bean finally arrives but he is refused entry to the theatre because of his filthy attire. Forced to borrow some clothes from the local launderette Bean is mistaken for the star of the show and ends up on the stage giving the operatic performance of a lifetime.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When one of the toy cars of his racing track set becomes broken, Mr. Bean decides to buy a new one but since his Mini has a flat tire, he decides to take a taxi. The taxi driver deliberately drives around the town and stops for gas and lunch in the hopes of getting a higher fare. Bean tries to escape, but other passengers mistake Bean as the driver, and Bean reluctantly drives the taxi.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Gotham’s annual dog show is tonight, and Harley plans to compete for the prized “Best in Show” ribbon. Sensing she’s up to no good, Robin decides to enter rough-and-tumble Ace the Bat-Dog to keep an eye on the thieving trickster.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bam must lead a new super vehicle team consisting of Nightbike, Goldie, Grundy, and Kitty after the Legion of Zoom traps the rest of the Batwheels in the Batcave.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: On Halloween Night, Poison Ivy brings all the pumpkins to life, creating an army of Snack-O-Lanterns that are eating all the candy. It’s up to Redbird and Bam to end her pumpkin panic to save Gotham’s Halloween fun, as well as their own.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird is convinced that nobody likes his eccentric dance moves, but when Toyman traps Robin behind a dance-themed gauntlet, it’s up to the rally car to dance his way to victory! / Can Bam learn to not give in to the bullys dares?

programme.title: Tom And Jerry
programme.desc: Tom is up to his usual nonsense, but two can play at this game as they take their chase into the neighbourhood. Leave it to Jerry to turn the tables on Tom!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Sunny Seagull hires The Looney Builders to build a carnival on Looneyburg’s pier. The crew gets so caught up trying to win the games that they lose sight of what matters.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders take turns distracting Petunia as they build her a big surprise birthday cake in the back yard.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the fondness of his beloved she-bear for meditation. To seduce her he sets out to prove to her that he too can attain the Zen attitude.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a super-secret Canadian Army prototype which resembles a simple computer keyboard. It has only several command keys: select, cut and paste, and delete, but the keys act directly on surrounding elements... as well as on living beings!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a blast with a bowling game they found in the Rangers storeroom. Grizzy hastens to destroy the pins to ensure his peace and quiet. But the Lemmings discover a remote-control device that can modify the balls weight. By setting it on maximum, the ball could knock over much more than pins: furniture, a bear and even a log cabin!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After the rains, to the great delight of the Lemmings, strange bouncing mushrooms have sprouted in the yard. To put an end to the Lemmings noisy games - which prevent Grizzy from enjoying his peace and quiet - Grizzy tramples the mushrooms. Only to realize that each crushed mushroom frees a cloud of spores that instantly creates... a bunch of identical mushrooms.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have laid hand on special magnets which turn any object they are stuck to into flying objects. Grizzy bears the consequences and is ejected out of the cabin on his couch, which has turned into a flying-couch. Upon landing, Grizzy discovers by chance that the magnet stuck to his forehead enables him to fly like Peter Pan.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: With a lion-tamers whip, a sugar bowl and lots of work, the Lemmings have successfully trained a caribou to go through their obstacle course. Grizzy cannot help but admire the performance. He decides to steal their idea, and the caribou, to create his own circus act and impress his lovely she-bear.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Safety standards at the Docs Lab remain shockingly low. Once, just once, it would be nice to invent something that doesnt then get out of hand and backfire, causing widespread chaos. Well, this shrink ray aint it. At first it works great (which is typical). Lamput is caught in a tiny vial, and the Docs are riding high on the triumph. Then they go over a small bump. Their risk management plan doesnt account for a "small bump". Before long Lamput and Skinny are engaged in a high speed chase through the Boss moustache. Seriously. Someone should just shrink this Lab right out of existence. No, wait, that happens too.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Pursuing Lamput is a dastardly career, but theres a right and a wrong way to go about it. Doc Specs cuts corners, showing up at the Lab with a fake Lamput made out of a jar of marmalade and a couple ping pong balls - a Jamposter! Specs relishes his new role as hero of the day, but his best friend Skinny smells a rat. As does Lamput, who is patently NOT captured. Not to mention a battalion of ants who dont care at all about Specs professional fortunes. Specs plan has a serious use-by date. Lucky Skinny can forgive. As a friend, hes the real deal.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: To escape the clutches of his dastardly pursuers, Lamput leaps onto Skinnys head and poses as a luscious mane of auburn hair. Shouldnt work. Works. Too well; Specs falls head over heels for this new redhead. Skinnys a bit puzzled as to why his bespectacled buddy is acting so weird all of a sudden. The course of true love never runs smooth; nor does the course of a moronic mixup between two annoying nerds. A wigless Skinny "crashes" Specs big fancy date (which, you know, Skinny was invited to) and Specs is very rude indeed about it. Now theyve both got broken hearts. Luckily ice-cream fixes everything.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is under strict instructions to water Mr Paliwal’s precious plant once a day while he’s on holiday. It’s all going fine, and Mr Bean is enjoying playing with his neighbour’s gadgets while he’s away. However, one day he forgets his task and has to let himself in late at night – but Mr Bean’s other neighbour, Bruiser, spots the suspicious activity, and thinks Mr Paliwal’s got a burglar!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean’s heart-throb Roxy is singing at the Palladium. With her record, poster, and T-shirt ready, he’s determined to get her autograph no matter what.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan into raising money for the local donkey sanctuary. He tries to thwart Declan’s success and increase the amount of money he’s raising until eventually he finds himself challenging Declan to a sky-diving competition.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Great Eduardo, violinist supreme, is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert. But Bean wont pay for the tickets. More than that, he claims that he can play the violin better. Now he has to prove it. After a lot of painful sawing, even Eduardo cant bear the noise. He offers to teach Bean, who ends up replacing him in the concert!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Fred staat terecht, veroordeeld voor het brein achter alle mysteries die hij heeft opgelost. Met de hulp van zijn advocaat, Daphne, gaan ze terug naar de gebeurtenissen van de dag in een stad die sinds de jaren 1950 was verlaten vanwege een giftige chemische lekkage waar een toxische mutant iedereen die in de buurt van de stad komt geterroriseert.

programme.title: Krypto Saves the Day!
programme.desc: Krypto embarks on a high-flying chase that creates major mayhem for a bus driver on his way to school. / The Bear is struggling against a greedy moth in his house. Trying to save his magic box he puts it on the porch and Masha finds the magic hat that can make her invisible

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: In the season two premiere episode, the gang force an over-worked Fred (FRANK WELKER) to relax and take some time off from mystery solving.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom is tricked into helping an evil magician capture all of the mice in the village but Jerry Van Mouseling foils the magicians plans.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Spike leaves Tom in charge of his boy Tyke only to discover upon his return that Tyke now behaves more like a cat than a dog.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom, forced into driving a race car created by evil Dr. Otto, terrorizes the village mice until Jerry Van Mouseling comes to their rescue.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The neighbors cat turns out to be a hipster whose laidback attitudes and behaviors are soon adopted by Tom and the other alley cats. Annoyed, Jerry decides to put an end to all of their silly nonsense.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Jerry battles Tom to save a crab from becoming the Duke and Duchesss main course.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: After taking the heat again from Ginger for Jerrys shenanigans, fed up Tom decides to pack his bags and go home to his birth family. But can you ever really go home again?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has played for too many hours on the console. His eyes are so fatigued he cannot stand a single ray of light. The Lemmings choose this very moment to throw a big birthday party with as many lights as possible! Grizzy goes to great lengths to settle the issue and decides to trip the power supply. The Lemmings discover a source of magical light deep in the savanna.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have organized a mega party at the cabin. This is obviously not to Grizzy’s liking and the bear throws them out. The Lemmings discover a cave where the party is even more fun, but their ruckus drives out the bats who seek refuge in the cabin. Terrified of them, Grizzy tries everything to get rid of them and understands that the most effective thing is the Lemmings’ ghetto blaster.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy needs the fridge to keep his fish cold, but the Lemmings want it to make ice for their miniature ice skating rink. When Grizzy finds a new model robot air conditioner that is both rapid and efficient, the problem seems to be solved: each party will have their own source of cold. But when the Lemmings activate the robot’s artificial intelligence, the gadget starts to feel a powerful love for the person who resembles him most in his new surroundings: the fridge. Grizzy and the Lemmings will do everything to break up this budding romance and recover the cold sources that are rightfully theirs.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a white bear that fell out of a zoo’s refrigerated truck. After consulting the encyclopedia, he realizes that he and the bear are brothers of the same species! He decides to follow the encyclopedia’s instructions to the letter and take care of his brother during his hibernation. This runs counter to all of the Lemmings favorite activities. The Lemmings decide to create a false encyclopedia page which says that they too are bears. Grizzy is now obliged to treat them like brothers as well.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Inspired by a magazine, Grizzy decides to redo the cabin’s interior design. To make sure everything is perfect, he ousts the Lemmings and their electric train. By chance, the Lemmings discover an underground futuristic premises in the middle of the savanna. From this secret place, they can see the entire savanna on a giant screen, down to the very inside of Grizzy’s cabin just like in a sandbox video game. By using the menus, they can have an impact on reality and thus... on Grizzy!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a magic stick that functions as a Yummy divining rod. Grizzy steals their stick and finds a Yummy deposit in the savanna. To take control over Grizzy’s discovery, the Lemmings set a trap to draw the bear far from the deposit and transform it into an industrial chocolate factory. Grizzy will want to recover his chocolate deposit.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Marvin the Martian hires The Looney Builders to build an outer space ball court on Mars. Bugs is a big fan of the sport, and soon becomes a ball and build “hog.”

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build their headquarters a car wash. Daffy doesn’t want to wash Dumpy and goes to extreme lengths to keep him dirty and preserve their memories.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Sunny Seagull hires The Looney Builders to build a carnival on Looneyburg’s pier. The crew gets so caught up trying to win the games that they lose sight of what matters.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders take turns distracting Petunia as they build her a big surprise birthday cake in the back yard.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build a float to lead the Flower Parade, but Porky won’t settle for anything less than Porky Perfect.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Harley Quinn’s Hyena goes missing, Bibi agrees to help Jestah look for her. / A sneaky trick strands the Batwheels at the docks, clearing the way for a Batcave heist by the Legion of Zoom.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: A sneaky trick strands the Batwheels at the docks, clearing the way for a Batcave heist by the Legion of Zoom. It’s up to MOE to stop the Zoomers with zany improvised tricks and traps with a little help from Ace and Batcomputer.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi and Batwing must work together to get past the Legion of Zoom in order to deliver a new giant screen to Batcomputer.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: The Batwheels take on a new vehicular villain who keeps growing bigger and bigger, while learning that size doesnt always win the day.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: While Green Lantern is having his spaceship repaired in the Batcave, the Batwheels want to play with his adorable alien pet, only to discover that this cute critter has wild alien powers!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Poison Ivy uses a rare pollen-spewing flower to put all of Gotham to sleep, its up to Bibi to save her friends and save the day. / Super-genius villain Egghead is on the loose, planning to use Gotham Museum’s famed giant egg to cook up a record-breaking breakfast.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves Halloween and prepares to give the neighbourhood kids some tricks and treats they won’t forget. But when Mr Bean gets carried away with his spooky pranks he becomes the target of even more fiendish tricks from his neighbours the Bruisers.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is painting a picture of Teddy when he accidently squirts some green paint onto his brown wallpaper. Oh no! Bean needs to redecorate his room fast but ends up painting all the walls a garish lime green instead of brown. He’s so terrified of Mrs Wicket finding out that when he goes to bed he has some very weird nightmares – with a rather sickly ending.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is no fan of wrestling. But he’s promised to take Mrs Wicket and her friend Mrs Wince to a big wrestling match in town. Bean finds himself lost backstage at the stadium and accidentally wanders through a door and straight into the wrestling ring where he finds himself up against Side Kick Rick. More by luck than talent Bean wins the match – only to find that now he has to fight the terrifying Bruise Force.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to see a very rare bird so he can tick off every page in his bird-spotting book. But he soon gets bored as he waits in a hide for the rare bird to appear. Instead he goes home and paints a picture of the bird cuts it out and sticks it high up a tree in the back garden. Soon he is besieged by excited twitchers who think it really is the rare bird. They are all keen to get a snap and they’re willing to pay good money for a peek.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean visits a safari park where he catches the attention of a baby monkey and unknowingly takes the monkey home in his Mini. After hearing on the news that the monkey has been "stolen", Bean attempts to return it without getting caught.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit loves dancing. The only Mushable she hasn’t danced with is Amanita. But Amanita doesn’t dance. Can Lilit get her dancing?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Miff has a blast playing a game with our Mushlers -- one that Fung refused to play. Now Fung worries that he has lost his best friend, and so tries to win her back.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: To prove to everyone that he does not make cooking mistakes, Sushi-Mushi revisits his chef training. But what he really needs training in, is admitting mistakes!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit is finding getting some "alone time" to herself tricky. So when she finds an old shell to hang out in the forest, she is rapt and doesnt want to share it.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When Mushpie starts coaching Sumush to become fitter, faster, stronger, it unleashes a new Mushpie: one who demands excellence and full commitment! Poor Sumush!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: To Truff, making music comes effortlessly. So when he needs to put in a big effort to make a ‘forest song’, it affects him in unusual ways.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: The crew plays hide-and-seek at headquarters, and Tweety is the seeker.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy gets rid of the Lemmings by crushing them with one of the rangers heavy trunks, which he immediately clears out of the cabin, his enemies stuck to it like stickers. What he doesnt know, is that the trunk contains a multifunction drone, complete with joystick and virtual reality headset, which enables "embedded" piloting. Thanks to this cutting-edge technology, the Lemmings decide to regain control of the situation!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the ranger¿s house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings happen on a native American Indian burial place under the rangers cabin. When they accidentally activate a magic disk representing the earth, they are sent back in time to the prehistoric era...

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a phial containing a love potion: anyone who drinks it immediately falls in love with the first creature he sees. Grizzy already imagines himself becoming irresistible in the eyes of his beloved she-bear. But that is without taking into account the Lemmings... clumsiness, and their rodeo caribou drinking the magic potion.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings notice that Grizzy moves away from the jar of chocolate spread whenever he chases the fly buzzing around him.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the ranger’s collection of bird calls by chance. With a simple blow of the whistle, he can attract a flock of partridges that are at his beck and call.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While fighting over a jar of chocolate spread, Grizzy and the Lemmings set off a chain reaction which sends the jar flying into space, where it damages a space station.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Even for a giant seven foot bear, its not easy getting rid of pesky lemmings but its all fun seeing them constantly try to outsmart each other with cheeky plans.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wants to try out the brand new packaging format of chocolate spread that he discovers in the rangers cupboard: a yummy-looking XXL jar. And he does not intend to share it with the Lemmings. After observing a chameleon toad that is able to blend into its surroundings, the Lemmings decide to make themselves invisible to attain Grizzys treasure.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is no fan of wrestling. But he’s promised to take Mrs Wicket and her friend Mrs Wince to a big wrestling match in town. Bean finds himself lost backstage at the stadium and accidentally wanders through a door and straight into the wrestling ring where he finds himself up against Side Kick Rick. programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean visits a safari park where he catches the attention of a baby monkey and unknowingly takes the monkey home in his Mini. After hearing on the news that the monkey has been "stolen", Bean attempts to return it without getting caught.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean fancies a game of golf so he creates his own golf course inside his flat and invites Irma to join him for a round. Their somewhat eccentric game takes them from sitting room to bathroom and through Mrs Wicket’s flat as they battle to be the winner of the First Bean Open Championship.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A crafty cat burglar is causing alarm and concern throughout the town with a series of daring rooftop robberies. After Mrs Wickets house is burgled and Bean has his wallet stolen he decides the only way to deal with this cunning housebreaker is to don a costume and become a superhero (like the ones in his favourite comic book). But Super Bean soon finds he has his hands full helping to rescue cats stuck in trees and old ladies with their spilled shopping.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is tidying his flat and chucking out a load of old unwanted junk. Unfortunately during the big clear out Teddy accidentally falls into a bin bag which gets put out in the street. Bean is horrified when the rubbish van arrives and he realises that dear old Teddy is now on his way to the landfill. Bean races across town to the dump but how will he ever find his friend amongst all the mountains of junk?

programme.desc: Fung and Miff have come across a rare piece of bark struck by lightning.

programme.title: Marketplace Middle East
programme.desc: The Middle East is undergoing a healthcare revolution, with cutting-edge medical technology, increased investment, and world-class facilities transforming the sector. At the forefront of this change is Sir Magdi Yacoub, the renowned British-Egyptian heart surgeon whose groundbreaking work has saved countless lives. Now, hes bringing his expertise home with the launch of a state-of-the-art hospital in Cairo, set to become a regional center of excellence in cardiac care and research. We explore Yacoubs legacy his vision for the future of healthcare in the region. Also: in this Abu Dhabi operation theatre room, the lead surgeon, Dr. Usman Ahmad, has multiple robot arms as he conducts surgery. As the first hospital in the Gulf to successfully perform robotic lung transplants, Cleveland Clinic Abu Dhabi is at the forefront of the region, presenting a strong case for utilizing robotics in the treatment of complex thoracic conditions. We explore the importance of robotic-assisted surgery for high-risk patients and how this will transform transplant care in the wider region.

programme.title: Marketplace Africa
programme.desc: As tourist numbers continue to rise worldwide, African wildlife parks are facing unprecedented challenges. In Kenyas iconic Masai Mara Reserve, the home of the Great Migration and one of the natural wonders of the world, the number of wildebeest migrating has dropped as tourist numbers have gone up. We take a look at the delicate balancing act required to ensure the preservation of the migration with evergrowing travel demands. Also: ranked one of Africas growing companies by the Financial Times in 2024, Hubtel originally began two decades ago as a messaging company in Ghana. Since then, its turned into an e-payments and commerce behemoth with 23 offices across Ghana. We spoke to CEO Alex Bram about the companys pivot towards fintech, growth strategy, and the importance of staying purely self funded within Ghana.

She opens up about her creative process, meteoric rise, and her mission to empower women through her Leading Vibe Initiative, offering an intimate look at an artist reshaping global music on her own terms.

programme.title: Marketplace Middle East
programme.desc: The Middle East is undergoing a healthcare revolution, with cutting-edge medical technology, increased investment, and world-class facilities transforming the sector. At the forefront of this change is Sir Magdi Yacoub, the renowned British-Egyptian heart surgeon whose groundbreaking work has saved countless lives. Now, hes bringing his expertise home with the launch of a state-of-the-art hospital in Cairo, set to become a regional center of excellence in cardiac care and research. We explore Yacoubs legacy his vision for the future of healthcare in the region. Also: in this Abu Dhabi operation theatre room, the lead surgeon, Dr. Usman Ahmad, has multiple robot arms as he conducts surgery. As the first hospital in the Gulf to successfully perform robotic lung transplants, Cleveland Clinic Abu Dhabi is at the forefront of the region, presenting a strong case for utilizing robotics in the treatment of complex thoracic conditions. We explore the importance of robotic-assisted surgery for high-risk patients and how this will transform transplant care in the wider region.

programme.title: Marketplace Africa
programme.desc: As tourist numbers continue to rise worldwide, African wildlife parks are facing unprecedented challenges. In Kenyas iconic Masai Mara Reserve, the home of the Great Migration and one of the natural wonders of the world, the number of wildebeest migrating has dropped as tourist numbers have gone up. We take a look at the delicate balancing act required to ensure the preservation of the migration with evergrowing travel demands. Also: ranked one of Africas growing companies by the Financial Times in 2024, Hubtel originally began two decades ago as a messaging company in Ghana. Since then, its turned into an e-payments and commerce behemoth with 23 offices across Ghana. We spoke to CEO Alex Bram about the companys pivot towards fintech, growth strategy, and the importance of staying purely self funded within Ghana.

programme.title: Quests World of Wonder
programme.desc: Richard celebrates a personal milestone - his 100th country visited - by embarking on an extraordinary journey through Omans rich culture and striking landscapes.

programme.title: Inside Africa
programme.desc: Across music, dance and comedy, a new wave of Ugandan performers is captivating audiences, all while championing a vibrant creative culture at home. We spotlight three standout talents : Afro-soul musician Joshua Baraka, international Latin dance maestro Valentino R. Kabenge, and comedy superstar Kansiime Anne, exploring how venues like the Uganda National Cultural Centre are nurturing the next generation of Ugandan performers.

programme.title: Dino Hunters
programme.desc: Mike Harris has come across fragments of a prehistoric herbivore. The dinosaur skull appears to belong to a duck-billed dinosaur— a lucrative find that could earn the cowboy from Wyoming several thousand dollars. The pricing in the fossil business follows a simple principle: the more complete the skeleton, the higher the price! Meanwhile, Clayton Phipps is busy preparing the heavy rock package, along with Tyrannosaurus bones, for transport, and in South Dakota, Jared Hudson is excavating a Cretaceous turtle skull.

programme.title: Dino Hunters

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb: Elokuva - Candace vastaan universumi
programme.desc: Candace ei ole vielakaan saanut veljiaan Finiasta ja Ferbia nalkkiin ja alkaa uskoa, etta koko universumi on hanta vastaan. Kun avaruusoliot kaappaavat hanet, han paatyy kaukaiselle planeetalle, jolla ei ole arsyttavia pikkuveljia ja jonka vaki palvoo hanta pelastajanaan. Onko han loytanyt paratiisinsa? Mutta kun Finias ja Ferb matkaavat ystavineen galaksin halki pelastamaan siskoaan, he saavat vihia avaruusolioiden pahaenteisesta salaisuudesta. Odotettua jatkoa rakkaalle sarjalle tuova FINIAS JA FERB -ELOKUVA: CANDACE VASTAAN UNIVERSUMI on eeppinen seikkailu taynna hulvattomia ja herttaisia hetkia.

programme.title: Timon ja Pumbaa
programme.desc: Kun Timon ja Pumba kaivavat kultaa Yukonissa, Timon loytaa pelkan pullonkorkin, kun taas Pumba loytaa kultakimpaleen, johon elefanttikin tukehtuisi. Timon on kateellinen Pumban tarkeasta asemasta menestyvana malminetsijana ja joutuu Kusko-Quintin manipuloinnin uhriksi. Timonilla ja Pumballa on erimielisyytta siita, auttaako surullista tiikeritarta, joka metsastaa ruokaa. Timonin mielesta petoelainta ei pitaisi auttaa, Pumban mielesta taas on tarkeaa auttaa hadassa olevia.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb tahtovat ottaa kesaloman jokaisesta paivasta kaiken irti! Joka paiva he keksivat uusia jannittavia jekkuja ja heidan kateellinen isosiskonsa Candace yrittaa kannella pojista aidille. Kyseessa saattaa olla vuoristoradan rakentaminen takapihalle, surffaaminen esikaupungin hyokyaalloissa tai matkustaminen ajassa taaksepain. Perheen lemmikki, Nokkaelain Perry, elaa kaksoiselamaa salaisena agenttina ja on joka jaksossa napit vastakkain ilkean Tohtori Tollontyon kanssa.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Gepardin vauhti inspiroi Finiasia ja Ferbia valmistamaan huippunopeat kengat. Candacea eivat poikien puuhat kiinnosta, silla han valmistautuu Jeremyn perheen retkipaivaan. Pian han huomaa luvanneensa liikoja yhdelle paivalle ja astuu viallisiin prototyyppikenkiin ehtiakseen ajoissa kaikkialle. Tollontyolla on rahahuolia, ja han murehtii, joutuuko hanen talonsa myyntiin. / Finias ja Ferb ovat isovanhempien luona kylassa yhdessa ystaviensa kanssa. Lasten kisaillessa kuumailmapalloillaan Candace paattaa ottaa rennosti ja luopuu tavoitteestaan nalkittaa pojat. Myohemmin han oppii olemaan sisukkaampi. Tohtori Tollontyo rakentaa dronttinaattorin ja uhkaa paastaa valloilleen pelottavan dronttilintuarmeijansa.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb rakentavat biosfaarin, jossa Isabella ja muuta partiotytot voivat hankkia ansiomerkkeja. Silla valin Candace pohtii, miksi Jeremy tykkaa hanesta ja tri Tollontyo ottaa kayttoon Sadenaattorinsa. / Candace lupaa Stacylle viettaa paivan taman kanssa ilman Jeremya, mutta yllattaen Jeremy tarttuu kiinni hanen kylkeensa. Han syyttaa veljiaan ja yrittaa saada nama irrottamaan Jeremyn samalla kun han itse yrittaa piilotella tata Stacylta. Samaan aikaan Isabella tahtoisi paasta viettamaan aikaa kahdestaan Finiaksen kanssa, mutta tama jahtaa ystavineen jattilaisrobottikoiraa ympari kaupunkia.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb rakentavat valtavan terashain Danvillen vuosittaisia Satamapaivia varten, mutta Candace on jalleen paattanyt karayttaa heidat. Stacyn ja kapteeni Tihrun avustamana Candace lahtee metsastamaan haita ja veljiaan. Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo onnistuu sotkemaan itsensa Suolavesitoffeennaattoriinsa. / Finias ja Ferb saavat selville, etta Kuun heikompi painovoima tekee jaatelosta erityisen hyvaa, joten he lastaavat raketin tayteen lehmia ja lentavat Kuuhun testaamaan teoriaa. Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo hyokkaa naapurinsa parvekekasvien kimppuun Kosteusimunaattorillaan ja Stacy auttaa Candacea kokkaamaan Jeremylle romanttisen aterian.

programme.title: Mom
programme.desc: Trillerlik lugu sellest, milleni võib viia aastatepikkune enesepettus, taitumata unistused ja armastuse puudus. Filmi keskmes on tulistamise tagajarjel koomasse langenud taiskasvanud poja eest hoolitsev naine, kes seisab silmitsi terve vaikelinna taie inimestega, kes uritavad tema pojaga juhtunu mõistatust lahendada. Osades Tiina Malberg, Andres Tabun, Andres Noormets, Siim Maaten, Jaan Pehk, Jaak Prints, Rea Lest. Stsenaristid Leana Jalukse ja Al Wallcat, lavastaja Kadri Kõusaar, produtsent Aet Laigu. Tootja Meteoriit.

programme.title: Blue Lights
programme.desc: Lojalistide kampade vaheline vaen avaldab tervele osakonnale survet. Annie langetab õhtul valja minnes impulsiivse otsuse.

programme.title: ERR.ee uudised
programme.desc: ERR.ee uudised

programme.title: Notsulood
programme.desc: Sageli arvatakse, et sigade kohta pole enam midagi uut õppida, ent tegelikkuses ei pruugi see tõele vastata, sest peale geneetilise sarnasuse võivad sead olla sama tundlikud ja targad, kui inimesed. Millised instinktid on kodustatud seal sailinud ja kuidas ta suhtleb inimesega? Liigutav dokumentaalfilm põimib kokku viie erineva notsu lood ja neis varjul olevad saladused.

programme.title: Meie kirjanduse lugu
programme.desc: Ester Kuntu vahendab lugusid Eesti kirjanikest ja analuusib nendega meie proosa ning luule tippteoseid. Neljandas osas jõuame valja tanapaeva. Kõneleme Lennart Meri fenomenist poliitikas, kaime kulas Leelo Tunglal ja tema tutrel Maarja Kangrol ning meenutame Kauksi Ülle ja Urmas Vadiga poorast aastatuhandevahetust Tartus. Sari sundis Eesti Kirjanike Liidu 100. sunnipaevaks. Toimetaja Kai Vaartnõu, konsultant Anu Tonts, režissoor Raivo Maripuu, produtsent Hannela Lippus.

programme.title: Maahommiku lood
programme.desc: "Maahommik" toob ekraanile arksad ideed, tegusad inimesed ja huvitavad ettevõtmised.

programme.title: Prillitoos
programme.desc: Õpetajate paeval saame kokku Hirvo Survaga, kes on laulma pannud sadu poisse. Missugune ta ise poisina oli raagivad tema vanemad Helga ja Jaan. Hirvo õpetaja Silvia Mellik, keda kõik viimased 90 aastat on Silluks kutsunud, raagib kui olulised toovahendid on dirigendi kaed. Anname tervisenõu ja pakume ideid, millega taita oma vaba aega. Saatejuht Reet Linna, kaasautor Aivi Parijõgi.

programme.title: Hommik Anuga
programme.desc: Hea tuju ja mõnus meeleolu. Ootamatud vaatenurgad ja lahedad nostalgialaksud! Saatejuht Anu Valba. Režissoor Rene Vilbre, produtsent Andres Arro.

programme.title: Muusikast Mihkel Rauaga
programme.desc: Teeme ekskursi popmuusika visuaalsetele radadele ja tuletame meelde meie kõige agedamaid muusikavideoid. Kui palju aega ja raha on praegused artistid valmis kulutama, et nende muusikat saadaks age visuaal? Mihkel Raua vestluskaaslasteks sel teemal on Karl-Erik Taukar, Jaagup Kreem, EIK, Genka, Kohver ja Korea, Yasmyn, Karl Killing, Tanel Padar, Robert Parelo, Masa, Marta Vaarik, Juri Pihel, Raivo Suviste, Renee Meriste, Sandra Sersant, Alar Kotkas, Auris Ratsep jt.

programme.title: Õpetaja. Luule Sulg
programme.desc: Maire Aunaste kais kulas Luule Sulel, kes on kehalise kasvatuse õpetaja ametit pidanud 66 aastat ja kes veel 85-aastaselt andis tunde Eidapere koolis. Režissoor Mati Kark, toimetaja Aivi Parijõgi.

programme.title: Karen Pirie
programme.desc: Mida kaugemale Karen oma uurimisega jõuab, seda selgemaks saab, et Cat pidi olema ise oma rooviga seotud. Nuud otsitakse roovlite jalgi juba valismaalt, kuid Cati isa tahab politsei uurimise lõpetada.

programme.title: Mom
programme.desc: Trillerlik lugu sellest, milleni võib viia aastatepikkune enesepettus, taitumata unistused ja armastuse puudus. Filmi keskmes on tulistamise tagajarjel koomasse langenud taiskasvanud poja eest hoolitsev naine, kes seisab silmitsi terve vaikelinna taie inimestega, kes uritavad tema pojaga juhtunu mõistatust lahendada. Osades Tiina Malberg, Andres Tabun, Andres Noormets, Siim Maaten, Jaan Pehk, Jaak Prints, Rea Lest. Stsenaristid Leana Jalukse ja Al Wallcat, lavastaja Kadri Kõusaar, produtsent Aet Laigu. Tootja Meteoriit.

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: Teelt leitakse surnud noormees, keda esialgu peetakse liiklusõnnetuse ohvriks. Ent kui Vera hakkab uurima mehe tegemisi turul ja tema suhteid teiste kaupmeeste ning lahedastega, saab peagi selgeks, et tema surm polnud õnnetu juhus.

programme.title: Maahommik
programme.desc: "Maahommik" randab mooda Eestimaad ringi ja kohtub erinevate inimeste ja nende põnevate tegemistega. Teie ees rullub lahti maaelu varvipalett koos kõikide oma varjunditega. Loomad, taimed, talud, tood ja musttuhat muud lugu ootab teid just "Maahommiku" saates. Saatejuht on Kerli Dello. Vastutav toimetaja Maili Metssalu, režissoorid Mikk Mae ja Mati Kark, produtsent Tiina-Mari Koljak.

programme.title: TeadusEST
programme.desc: Kas inimesi on tootmises robotite keskele enam vaja? Toostuse tugevuseks on kiired, tugevad ja ka uha enam arukad masinad. Tehisaru võimalused on kaivitamas toostusrevolutsiooni viiendat lainet. Inimese roll tootmisahelas on igal juhul muutumas. "TeadusEST" piilub nii tarka tootmist arendavates laborites kihavasse leiutajatoosse kui ka tootmisuksustesse, kus tulevik on juba kohal. Saatejuht-toimetaja Kristjan Pihl, toimetaja Kertu Loide, režissoor Liis Lindmaa, produtsent Anatoli Tafitšuk, tootja Ulm Production. Saade valmib koostoos Eesti Teadusagentuuriga.

programme.title: Aktuaalne kaamera
programme.desc: Alaliselt jarelvaadatav

programme.title: Ukraina stuudio
programme.desc: USA hakkab vaidetavalt Kiievile jagama luureinfot, mille abil saab Ukraina veelgi tõhusamalt runnata Venemaa sugavuses asuvaid naftatootlemise ettevõtteid. Lisaks tekitavad Moskvas arevust ka teated, et Kiiev võib USAlt saada legendaarseid Tomahawk tiibrakette. Kas ja kuidas muudavad need arengud sõja dunaamikat, selgitab kindralmajor reservis Neeme Vali. Euroopa liidrid ei suuda jõuda uksmeelele Venemaa kulmutatud varade kasutuselevõtu osas Ukraina abistamiseks. Kopenhaagenis toimunud tippkohtumist reklaamiti kui kiiret kokkusaamist, et leppida kokku bloki enneolematute uute sõjaliste võimete loomises ja Ukrainale pakutavas laiaulatuslikus lisatoetuses. Ometi ei selgunud sellel sisuliselt midagi. Miks on Euroopa hambutu, kommenteerib kaitseuuringute keskuse direktor Kristi Raik. Saatejuht on Joosep Vark. Toimetaja Peep Kala, režissoor Rait Roland Veskemaa, produtsent Tiina-Mari Koljak.

programme.title: Klassikatahed
programme.desc: „Klassikatahtede“ teises võistlussaates peavad noored talendid tõestama end meisterliku virtuoosina. Kui kiiresti ja eksimatult või aeglaselt ning laulvalt on võimalik oma pill kõlama panna? Professionaalse žurii ja publiku silme all tuleb nuud teha etteaste, kus aastate kaupa lihvitud tehnika ja pillimanguosavus kõige hiilgavamalt valja tuleb! Kas noorte esitused pakuvad muusikalist elamust või jaavad nad tehniliselt hatta, hindavad maailmas palju nainud dirigendid Paavo Jarvi, Risto Joost ja bariton Lauri Vasar. Saatejuht on Johan Randvere, formaadi autorid Helen Valkna, Anu Valba ja Timo Steiner ning režissoor Krista Luts. Konkurss „Klassikatahed“ sunnib Eesti Televisiooni, Klassikaraadio, Eesti Kontserdi ja Kultuuripartnerlus SA koostoos.

programme.title: Hercule Poirot
programme.desc: Poirot sõber kirjanik Ariadne Oliver viibib laste halloweeni peol, kus uks tudrukutest hoopleb, et on nainud pealt mõrva. Veidi hiljem leitakse sama tudruk surnult. Muidugi kutsub madam Oliver appi oma sõbra Poirot, kes hakkab uurima kahtlasi surmajuhtumeid lahikonnas, millele tudruk võis vihjata.

programme.title: Mullist valja
programme.desc: Anastassia ja Grigori liiguvad rindejoonele uha lahemale. Venemaa pidevate runnakute all elavates kulades on elu raske, kuid inimeste kaitsetahe pusib kõrge, kuna neil on varskelt meeles, meid kulastanud "Vene maailma" hirmuteod. Teekond viib meid ohtlikele radadele, kuna verejanuline vaenlane on meist vaid mõne kilomeetri kaugusel.

programme.title: Osoon
programme.desc: Koerte suureparane lõhnataju on inimestele palju abiks. Sisekaitseakadeemia teenistuskoerte koolituskeskuses on kaimas põnev uuring, mis aitab veelgi paremini mõista ja rakendada koera teravat nina narkootiliste ainete leidmiseks. Eesti looduse uheks rikkuseks on meie meresaarte rohkus ja tõelise saarefanni Kadri Alleri eesmark on kaia neist võimalikult paljudel. Naine, kelle kogemustepagasis on juba enam kui saja Eesti saare kulastus, võtab meid kaasa retkele Vareslaiule. Saate autorid on Kristo Elias ja Sander Loite, toimetaja Marit Valk, režissoor Keiti Valiste, produtsent Heiki Sepp.

Kampaania põhjustas kirgliku konflikti Iisraeli ja Palestiinat toetavate aktivistide vahel, mis peegeldab tuhandete kilomeetrite kaugusel mollava sõja keerukust.

programme.title: Tuleb tuttav ette
programme.desc: Eesti Televisioon on ajast aega panustanud suuri jõude aastavahetuse programmidesse, milles esinesid nii menulaulikud kui ka menumõtlejad. Saates keskendume ennekõike aastavahetuse muusikasaadetele. Millisena me neid maletame? Saatejuht Reet Linna, režissoor Maire Radsin.

programme.title: Kotikino esittaa: Cut Bank
programme.desc: Dwayne McLaren on etsinyt jo pitkaan tilaisuutta karistaa synnyinkaupunkinsa, pikkuruisen Cut Bankin tomut jaloistaan. Eraana paivana Dwayne ja hanen kauneuskilpailuista haaveileva tyttoystavansa, Cassandra, osuvat sattumalta oikeaan paikkaan vaaraan aikaan – vai sittenkin ihan oikeaan aikaan? Dwayne oivaltaa tilaisuutensa tulleen: tassa voisi olla hanen ja Cassandran paasylippu suureen kaupunkiin – ja parempaan elamaan.

Hellevaara etsii aarteita hyvin tyypillisesti esimerkiksi metallinpaljastimella, mutta muitakin keinoja on kaytossa. Mika on aarre? Se voi kaytannossa olla jotain materiaalia, mutta sen ulottuvuus voi olla myos jossain muussa.

programme.title: Kotikino esittaa: Eiffel
programme.desc: Hallitus painostaa Gustave Eiffelia luomaan jotakin vuoden 1889 Pariisin maailmannayttelyyn. Kun Eiffel tapaa naisen menneisyydestaan, kohtaaminen innoittaa hanta muuttamaan Pariisin siluetin ikuisiksi ajoiksi.

programme.title: Autohullut
programme.desc: K2 J1 Arttu Harkin ja stunttimestari Crazy Miken alias Mauri Uuskosken tahdittama kotimainen sarja, jossa testataan autojen myyntipuheiden paikkansapitavyytta. Jaksoissa vuorottelevat asiapitoinen autojen testaus ja stunttileikittely tahtivieraiden kanssa.

programme.title: Kotikino esittaa: Evolution
programme.desc: Palkittujen ohjaaja Kornel Mundruczon ja kasikirjoittaja Kata Weberin neljannessa yhteisessa elokuvassa kaydaan lapi perheen historiaa kolmen sukupolven ajalta, surrealistisesta 2. maailmansodan muistosta nykypaivan Berliiniin. Isoaidin sanoinkuvaamaton tuska ja hapea tulevat nakyvaksi Mundruczon elokuvailmaisun ja Weberin henkilokohtaisen kasikirjoituksen kautta, ja vaikka trauman taakka painaa edelleen, perhe katsoo kohti toiveikkaampaa tulevaisuutta.

programme.title: Et Sa Noin Voi Sanoo!

programme.title: Unelmahaat

programme.title: Before Sunrise
programme.desc: Richard Linklaterin romanttisen trilogian ensimmaisessa osassa amerikkalainen Jesse ja ranskalainen Celine kohtaavat junassa Budapestin ja Wienin valilla. Celine on palaamassa Pariisiin, Jessella on liput lennolle seuraavana aamuna Wienista kotiin. He kiinnostuvat toisistaan, ja Celine jaa Jessen pyynnosta viettamaan iltaa taman kanssa Wieniin. Illan muuttuessa yoksi pari kulkee kaupungin katuja ja keskustelee kaikesta maan ja taivaan valilla. Yhteys heidan valillaan voimistuu tunti tunnilta, mutta onko rakkaudella mahdollisuuksia kahden tuntemattoman sattumanvaraisessa kohtaamisessa kaukana kotoa?
